dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'gro ba'am/ 'ong bar yang mi mngon pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gnas pa
yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ tshu rol lam/ pha rol ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshu rol yang ma yin/ pha rol yang ma
yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
rnam par shes pa ni/ tshul khrims sam/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshul khrims kyang ma yin/
'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
rnam par shes pa ni/ rjes su chags pa'am/ khong khro ba ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rjes su chags pa yang ma yin/ khong
khro ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
par shes pa ni/ sbyin par byed pa'am/ len pa ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ len
pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
shes pa ni/ bzod pa'am/ mi bzod pa ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bzod pa yang ma yin/ mi bzod pa yang ma yin
pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/
brtson 'grus sam/ le lo ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyang ma yin/ le lo yang ma yin pa gang
yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ ting nge
'dzin yang ma yin/ sems rnam par g.yeng ba yang ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin kyang ma yin/
sems rnam par g.yeng ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ shes rab kyang ma yin/ 'chal ba'i shes rab kyang ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shes
rab kyang ma yin/ 'chal ba'i shes rab kyang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor
ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ phyin ci log gam/ phyin ci log ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ phyin ci log kyang ma yin/ phyin ci log ma yin pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs
dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'am/ dran pa nye bar ma gzhag pa ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ dran pa yang ma yin/ mi dran pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs
dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ yang dag pa'i spong ba'am/ yang dag pa'i spong ba ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag pa'i spong ba ma yin/ yang dag pa'i spong ba ma yin pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi
rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'am/ tshad med pa ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor

ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yang ma yin/ tshad med pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal
gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam ma yin te/
gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ rig pa'am/ rnam par grol ba ma yin te/
gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rig pa yang ma yin/ rnam par grol ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
pa'o| |rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge
'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa yang ma yin/ mngon par shes pa yang ma yin/ mngon par shes pa ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa yang ma yin/ mngon par shes pa yang ma yin/ mngon
par shes pa ma yin pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma med pa'am/ smon pa med pa ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
shes pa ni/ stong pa nyid kyang ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin/ smon pa med pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par
gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ 'dus byas kyang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis
rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ 'du ba'am/ mi 'du ba ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ 'du ba yang ma yin/ mi 'du ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs
dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ shes pa'am/ mi shes pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
rnam par shes pa ni/ shes pa yang ma yin/ mi shes pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ rlom sems sam/ g.yo ba'am/ spros pa ma mchis te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
rnam par shes pa rlom sems ma yin/ g.yo ba ma yin/ spros pa med pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor
ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
dang | rnam par shes pa ni/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam
par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ nye bar zhi ba yang ma yin/ nye bar ma zhi ba yang ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor
ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi ba yang ma yin/ nye bar ma zhi ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis
rnam par gnon pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ ldog pa yang ma yin/ mi ldog pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ ldog pa yang ma yin/ mi ldog pa yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par
gnon pa/ gang phung po lnga po dag mngon du 'grub par gtogs par bstan pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang phung po lnga po dag mngon du 'grub par gtogs par bstan

pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/
gang khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mngon du 'grub par gtogs pa bstan pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing
'brel bar 'byung ba mngon du 'grub par gtogs pa bstan pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa mngon du 'grub par gtogs pa bstan pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang

phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa mngon du 'grub par gtogs pa bstan pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang sred par spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug mngon du 'grub par gtogs pa bstan pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang sred

par spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug mngon du 'grub par gtogs pa bstan pa'i de bzhin dang / ma nor ba de bzhin dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis mngon du 'grub par gtogs pa bstan pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ lta bar gyur pa drug
cu rtsa gnyis mngon par 'grub par gtogs pa bstan pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin
nyid de| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa de/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /
gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang mngon par shes pa lnga po dag bstan pa
de| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang mngon par shes pa lnga bstan pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de
bzhin nyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad mngon du
'grub par gtogs pa bstan pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji

lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam mngon du 'grub par gtogs pa bstan pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag

par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam mngon du 'grub par gtogs pa bstan pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /
gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa de/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba
rnam par dag pa bstan pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba
rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang 'dus byas su gtogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mi gnas pa/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams bstan pa de/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang 'dus byas su gtogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mi gnas pa/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams bstan pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid
dang | gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i chos bstan pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
smon pa med pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i chos bstan pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de
bzhin nyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las
'das pa bstan pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / 'dod chags dang / bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa'i de bzhin
nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ gzugs su gtogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par gtogs pa yang shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba yang ma yin/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkhar gtogs pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs
kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
ma yin/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos su gtogs pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dge ba dang / mi
dge ba'i chos su gtogs pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sems can gyi khams su gtogs pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin zhing / chos de dag las rnam
par grol ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang du yang
gtogs pa yang ma yin/ mi gtogs pa yang ma yin te/ gang gtogs pa dang / gang mi gtogs pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de
bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de/ gang gi tshig bla dwags yin zhe na/ rab
kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis dmigs pa'i chos de dag ni/ de bzhin du ma yin zhing / gzhan du yang ma yin/ ji ltar chos rnams de bzhin gshegs
pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpas mthong ba'i chos de lta bu ni/ de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/ de'i phyir de
bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam
par gnon pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang 'bri ba'i phyir ram/ 'phel ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /chos gang 'du ba'i phyir ram/ 'bral ba'i phyir ram/ bri
ba'i phyir ram/ gang ba'i phyir ram/ gsog pa'i phyir ram/ mi gsog pa'i phyir ram/ 'pho ba'i phyir ram/ mi 'pho ba'i phyir ram/ skye ba'i phyir ram/ 'gog pa'i phyir ram/ kun nas nyon
mongs pa'i phyir ram/ rnam par byang ba'i phyir ram/ 'jug pa'i phyir ram/ ldog pa'i phyir ram/ kun 'byung ba'i phyir ram/ nub pa'i phyir ram/ mtshan nyid kyi phyir ram/ mtshan nyid ma
yin pa'i phyir ram/ mnyam pa'i phyir ram/ mi mnyam pa'i phyir ram/ kun rdzob kyi phyir ram/ don dam pa'i phyir ram/ bde ba'i phyir ram/ sdug bsngal ba'i phyir ram/ rtag pa'i phyir ram/ mi
rtag pa'i phyir ram/ sdug pa'i phyir ram/ mi sdug pa'i phyir ram/ bdag gi phyir ram/ bdag med pa'i phyir ram/ bden pa'i phyir ram/ rdzun pa'i phyir ram/ byed pa po'i phyir ram/ byed

pa po med pa'i phyir ram/ 'byung ba'i phyir ram/ mi 'byung ba'i phyir ram/ ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ram/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ram/ 'chi 'pho ba'i phyir ram/ skye ba'i phyir ram/ skyes pa'i phyir ram/
mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir ram/ skye ba'i phyir ram/ skye ba kun 'byung ba'i phyir ram/ tshogs pa'i phyir ram/ ma tshogs pa'i phyir ram/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i phyir ram/ 'dod chags
dang bral ba'i phyir ram/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i phyir ram/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i phyir ram/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i phyir ram/ gti mug dang bral ba'i phyir ram/ phyin ci log gi phyir ram/ phyin
ci log ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ dmigs pa'i phyir ram/ dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ram/ zad pa'i phyir ram/ mi zad pa'i phyir ram/ shes pa'i phyir ram/ mi
shes pa'i phyir ram/ dma' ba'i phyir ram/ mtho ba'i phyir ram/ phan pa'i phyir ram/ mi phan pa'i phyir ram/ 'gro ba'i phyir ram/ mi 'gro ba'i phyir ram/ yod pa'i phyir ram/
med pa'i phyir ram/ rjes su chags pa'i phyir ram/ khong khro ba'i phyir ram/ snang ba'i phyir ram/ mun pa'i phyir ram/ le lo'i phyir ram/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i phyir ram/ stong
pa nyid kyi phyir ram/ stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ mtshan ma'i phyir ram/ mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ram/ smon pa'i phyir ram/ smon pa med pa'i phyir ram/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i
phyir ram/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir ram/ nub pa'i phyir ram/ nub pa med pa'i phyir ram/ rig pa'i phyir ram/ rnam par grol ba'i phyir ram/ nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ram/ nye bar ma zhi ba'i
phyir ram/ grub pa'i phyir ram/ mi grub pa'i phyir ram/ tshul bzhin gyi phyir ram/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ yongs su shes pa'i phyir ram/ yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ram/
nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ram/ nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ 'dul ba'i phyir ram/ 'dul ba ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ tshul khrims kyi phyir ram/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims
kyi phyir ram/ rnam par g.yeng ba'i phyir ram/ rnam par g.yeng ba ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ shes rab kyi phyir ram/ 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi phyir ram/ rnam par shes pa'i phyir ram/ rnam par
shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ gnas pa'i phyir ram/ mi gnas pa'i phyir ram/ bskal pa mnyam pa'i phyir ram/ bskal pa mi mnyam pa'i phyir ram/ 'byung ba'i phyir ram/ 'jig pa'i phyir
ram| thob pa'i phyir ram/ ma thob pa'i phyir ram/ mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir ram/ mngon par rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir ram/ mngon sum du mi bya ba'i
phyir ram| rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir ram/ rab tu rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// //bam po gsum pa/
rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu rmi lam rmis pas rmi lam gyi rang bzhin bshad pa bstan kyang rmi lam gyi rang bzhin bstan pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmi
lam nyid kyang med na/ rmi lam gyi rang bzhin bstan pa lta ga la yod/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ston kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yang med do/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rmi lam ni/ chos gang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang yang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mthong
ba'i skyes bu sgyu ma'i rang bzhin bshad pa ston kyang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gang yang med na/ sgyu ma'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
ston kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa gang yang med do/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma ni/ chos gang mngon par 'grub pa'i
phyir yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par
gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig yor mthong ba'i skyes bu mig yor gyi rang bzhin ston kyang mig yor gyi rang bzhin gang yang med na/ mig yor gyi rang bzhin bstan pa lta ga
la yod| rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yang med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa lta ga la yod/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig yor ni/ chos gang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ smig rgyu mthong ba'i skyes bu smig rgyu bshad pa

ston kyang smig rgyu bstan pa gang yang med na/ smig rgyu bstan pa'i rang bzhin lta ga la yod/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston kyang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa gang yang med do/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ smig rgyu ni/ chos gang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa yang ma yin no/ /de
bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brag ca'i spyod yul la gnas pa'i

skyes bus brag ca'i sgra thos kyi/ de ni/ mi mthong ste/ nam bdag gis sgra phyung ba de'i tshe sgra de thos so/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshig thos par 'gyur yang chos gang
bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba med de/ gzhan du na nam mngon par bshad pa de'i ste kun shes shing / thos pa'i lam du 'gyur ro/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/

lbu ba rdos pa mthong ba'i skyes bu lbu ba rdos pa'i rang bzhin ston kyang lbu ba rdos pa'i rang bzhin nang dang phyi nas kyang mi dmigs na/ de bstan pa'i rang bzhin dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab kyi rtsal
gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yang mi dmigs so/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon
pa| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lbu ba rdos pa de ni/ chos gang mngon par 'grub pa'i rang bzhin du nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

yang chos gang mngon par 'grub pa'i rang bzhin du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i chu bur mthong ba'i skyes bu chu'i chu bur gyi rang bzhin ston
kyang chu'i chu bur gyi rang bzhin yang med na/ chu'i chu bur gyi rang bzhin bstan pa lta ga la yod/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston kyang shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med do/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i chu bur ni/ chos gang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bar nye bar gnas pa ma yin
no| |rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bar nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par
gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bus chu shing gi snying po kun du btsal kyang mi rnyed mod kyi/ 'on kyang de'i 'dab ma rnams kyis dgos pa byed do/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par
gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang snying po med mod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas dgos pa yang byed do/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta
ste| dper na/ skyes bus nam mkha' ston par tha snyad 'dogs kyang nam mkha' la ni/ bstan pa ci yang med do/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa zhes tha snyad 'dogs kyang chos gang bstan par yang tha snyad gdags par bya ba med do/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs

kyang chos gang bstan par yongs su grub cing tha snyad gdags pa med do/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes tha snyad 'dogs kyang chos gang bstan par
tha snyad du gdags pa med do/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ grib ma dang / nyi logs zhes tha snyad 'dogs kyang 'di gnyis ni/ chos gang yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir
yang nye bar mi gnas la snang ba yang mngon no/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa'i tshig tu 'gro yang chos gang bstan par
yang tha snyad kyi tshig tu yang mi 'gro la/ chos rnams snang bar yang byed do/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che sbyangs pa ni/ snang ba chen por nye bar
gnas par gyur kyang snang ba de nang ngam phyi rol na med do/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snang ba'i bya ba chen pos
nye bar gnas kyang / snang ba de ni/ nang ngam phyi rol du mthong bar nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yungs mar gyi mar me bus na/ de'i 'od
'phro ba yud tsam yang mi gnas mod kyi/ snang bar yang byed/ snang ba des gzugs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa chos gang la yang mi gnas mod kyi/ chos rnams kyi snang ba'i bya ba yang byed de/ snang ba des 'phags pa rnams chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su ma grub pa bstan pa ngo mtshar lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de de bzhin te/ shA
ri'i bu| de de bzhin no/ /gzugs yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /ma rig pa yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /'du byed yongs su ma grub pa
dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma grub pa dang / ming dang gzugs yongs su ma grub pa dang / skye mched drug yongs su ma grub pa dang / reg pa yongs su ma grub pa dang / tshor ba yongs
su ma grub pa dang / sred pa yongs su ma grub pa dang / len pa yongs su ma grub pa dang / srid pa yongs su ma grub pa dang / skye ba yongs su ma grub pa dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba
dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /khams dang /
skye mched yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa dang /
lta ba rnam par spyod pa dang / gsog pa dang / nye bar gsog pa yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba yang
ma yin| sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur ba yongs
su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /kun 'byung ba dang / nub pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes
bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes par byed pa dang / shes
par byed du bcug pa yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub po/ /bden pa dang / rdzun pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / 'gro ba dang / mi 'gro ba
dang / mthong ba dang bcas pa dang / mi mthong ba dang / nang dang / phyi yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang /
'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa dang / chos kyi khams yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma

grub bo| |las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / rgyu dang / rkyen dang / chad pa dang / rtag pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang /
dbus dang / tshul khrims dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par g.yeng ba
dang / shes rab dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de ma thag pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par
byang ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden
pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /

smon pa med pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho
ba med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / lung du bstan pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / dkar po dang / nag po dang / dkar nag ma yin pa dang / gtogs pa dang / mi gtogs
pa dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dang / 'bring dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rlom sems
dang / gnas pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / dmigs pa dang / rgyu dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / 'du ba dang / gnyis kyi mtshan nyid dang / ma skyes
pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / zad pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog
pa dang / phung po thams cad nges par 'dor ba dang / 'byung ba dang / kun rdzob dang / don dam pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
chags pa med pa'i ye shes dang / rang byung gi ye shes dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / rang
sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshad med par gtogs pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba bzhin bstan du med pa dang /
chos thams cad shes pa dang / mthong ba yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /bsil bar 'gyur pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba yongs su
ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /
mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su

ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub bo/ /mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub bo/ /dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad
kyi bar du yongs su ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma grub ste/ de bzhin du thams cad la yang rgyas par sbyar ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni/ gzugs
med| bstan du med/ dngos po med de/ yongs su ma grub bo/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzugs med/ bstan du med/ dngos po med de/ yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /shA ri'i

bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'ja' ni/ tshon gyi rnam pa sna tshogs su kun tu snang yang de la tshon gang yang yongs su grub pa med de/ mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bstan
pa sna tshogs su nye bar gnas mod kyi/ de la bstan pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la sor mo lnga yongs su grub par sngon nam yang sus kyang ma mthong

ngo / /shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin sngon nam yang sus kyang ma mthong ngo / /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mthong bar dka' ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar su la yang mthong
bar nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ khong du chud par dka' ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di
ltar 'di la ni/ gang mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa yongs su grub pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bstan
du ma mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar chos gang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rang
bzhin ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pas/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med do/ /khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /phyin ci
log dang / sgrib pa dang / lta bar gyur pa dang / sred pa rnam par spyod pa rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang /
gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor
bar byed pa rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa dang / chos kyi khams rang bzhin med
pas| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/
tshul khrims dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes rab dang / 'chal
pa'i shes rab rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med
do| |'phags pa'i bden pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / mngon par shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rang
bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /zad pa dang /
'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /mi skye ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa rang bzhin med pas/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /mya ngan las 'das pa rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang
sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /don dam pa shes pa bstan pa dang / kun rdzob rang bzhin med pas/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /chags pa med pa'i ye shes dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do/ /
de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos
gang yang yongs su grub pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags/ 'gog pa'i slad du ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/
chos gang yang skye ba'i phyir ram/ yongs su grub pa'i phyir ram/ 'gog pa'i phyir ram/ bdag med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang la yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar chos nyid kyang med na/ gang la dmigs
par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad dmigs pa med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang 'bri ba'am/ 'phel ba'i slad du nye bar gnas
pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang 'bri bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes
su mi mthong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang las yang dag par 'da' ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA
ri'i bu| 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos
gang yang 'bri ba'am/ gsog pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang 'bri ba'am/ gsog par 'gyur
ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang yang 'du ba'am/ 'bral ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /
bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ kun tu sbyor ba'am/ kun tu mi sbyor ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang gi tshul lam/ tshul ma lags pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang bkur ba dang / /rnam par bkur ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang
la yang phan pa dang / gnod pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang la yang phan pa'am/ gnod par bya
ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang 'byung ba'am/ mi 'byung ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags
so| |bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang 'byung ba'am/ mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang la yang sbyor ba'am/ mi sbyor ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang sbyor ba'am/ mi sbyor ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang dang yang gnas
pa'am| mi gnas pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gnas par byed pa'am/ gnas par mi byed pa'i
chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang 'jug pa'am/ ldog pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal
pa| shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang 'jug pa'am/ ldog pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang gi bya ba'am/ byed pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang gi bya ba'am/ byed
par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang gi mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags
so| |bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang yang sdud pa'am/ kun sdud pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos
gang bsdu bar bya ba'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bgyi ba gang gis
kyang nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang bya ba byed pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ zab lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po/ /shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /ma rig pa zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /'du byed dang /

rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /phyin ci log zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa zab bo/ /sgrib pa lnga zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /lta ba zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /bdag zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /
sems can zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /spros pa zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ spros pa med pa zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /tshul
khrims dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam
par g.yeng ba dang / shes rab dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / phyin
ci ma log pa dang / lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / 'das pa dang /
ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /mi 'jigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / /mngon par shes pa zab pas
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sangs rgyas dang /
chos dang / dge 'dun zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / mi 'gog pa shes pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes pa dang /
'dod chags dang bral ba zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sgrib pa zab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ rgya mtsho ni/ rgya che zhing zab ste/ dpag tu med do/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rgya che zhing zab ste/ dpag tu med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ zab ces bya ba ni/
chos rin po che dpag tu med pa bsags par gyur pa gang gting mi rnyed pa'o/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ zab ces bya ba de la 'gro ba mi rnyed pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ zab ces bya ba ni/ de'i yon
tan gyi mtha' mi rtogs pa'o/ /shA radwa ti'i bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mtsho chen po rgya mtsho ni/ rin po che thams cad bsags pa/ rin po che dpag tu med pas gang ba/ rin po che
chen pos rab tu gang ba'o/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos rin po che thams cad bsags pa/ chos rin po che chen po bsags pa/ chos rin po che dpag tu med pa
bsags pa'o/ /gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang bstan pa'i chos gang yang dmigs par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/
chos gang 'tshal ba'am/ ma 'tshal bar nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang shes pa'am/ mi shes par 'gyur ba'i
chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang yang bsrung ba'am/ sba ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka'
stsal pa| shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang bsrung ba'am/ sba bar bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang yang kun tu sdud pa'am/ yongs su sdud pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
chos gang kun tu bsdu ba'am/ yongs su bsdu bar bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang gi gnas su
yang nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang la gnas bca' ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang gi gnas sam/ gzhir yang nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa ni/ gang la gnas sam/ gzhir bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang
yang mngon par zhen par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang la mngon par zhen par bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang la yang lhag par zhen pa nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang la yang lhag par zhen par bya ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos
gang dang yang gnas pa'am/ mi gnas par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang dang lhan cig tu gnas pa'i
chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang gi mtshams sbyar ba'am/ mtshams sbyar ba ma lags par yang nye bar
gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang mtshams sbyar bar bya ba'am/ mtshams sbyar bar bya ba ma yin pa'i chos gang
yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang la yang 'dod chags sam/ 'dod chags dang bral bar nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /
bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang la chags par 'gyur ba'am/ mi chags par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang la yang zhe sdang ngam/ zhe sdang ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'am/ zhe sdang med pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos
gang la yang gti mug gam/ gti mug dang bral bar nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang la rmongs pa'am/
rmongs par mi 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang gi shes pa po'am/ shes par bgyid pa ma lags
so| |bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang shes pa'am/ chos gang shes par byed par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang gi rang bzhin nam/ rang bzhin ma lags par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka'
stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang gi rang bzhin nam/ rang bzhin ma yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang gi dag pa'am/ rnam par dag par yang nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang sbyong ba'am/ rnam par sbyong ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di ni| rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ shA ri'i bu/
tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ ma rig pa yongs su dag pas shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ 'du byed yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / ming dang gzugs yongs su dag pa dang / skye mched drug yongs su dag

pas| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go /reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba yongs su dag pas/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su dag go/ phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa dang / lta bar gyur pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go /bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed
bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / mthong ba po yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yongs su dag go/ chad pa dang / rtag pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ mtha' dang / mtha' med pa yongs su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ sbyin pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
shes rab yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ dbang bo dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang /
rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go /byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang /
btang snyoms yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ phyin ci ma log pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang /
lam yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go /mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ lam yongs su
dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ nyan thos kyi sa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su dag
pas| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go /sangs rgyas kyis yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yongs su dag go/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pas
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ 'dod pa'i khams yongs su dag pa dang / gzugs kyi khams yongs su dag pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams yongs su dag pas/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ sa'i khams yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams yongs su dag pas/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ sems can gyi khams yongs su dag pa dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yongs su dag go/ de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ngo mtshar lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/ gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs ma mchis/ bstan du ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di
ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang gi gzugs yongs su grub pa las bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di ni/ thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang la thogs pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par
rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ ma bgyis pa'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir
ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ yang dag par 'du ba ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang dang lhan cig 'du bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/
gdags su ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang gis gdags pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ thun mong ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang dang thun mong du 'gyur
ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ mtshan
nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ snang ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ snang ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzugs mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /phyin ci log mtha' yas pas
pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /sgrib pa mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /ma rig pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par
shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / ming dang gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba
dang | 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
mtha' yas so/ /lta bar gyur ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug mtha' yas pa dang / chad pa dang / rtag pa mtha' yas pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mu
mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i mu mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /sbyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshul khrims
mtha' yas pa dang / bzod pa mtha' yas pa dang / brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa dang / bsam gtan mtha' yas pa dang / shes rab mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
yas so| |dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mtha' yas pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa dang / phyin
ci ma log pa mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas so/ /bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pas/ pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /dmigs pa mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba mtha' yas pas/ pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / sangs rgyas
kyi chos mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /bdag dang / sems can mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /'dod pa'i khams mtha' yas pas/
pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /gzugs kyi khams mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /mngon par shes pa
mtha' yas pa dang / sgrib pa mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ye shes mthong ba mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa
'di mtha' yas so/ /chags pa med pa mtha' yas pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas pa dang / chos kyi dbying mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ thog ma dang / par dang / tha ma mi dmigs so/ /gang gis kyang mi dmigs so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas mu
med pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i mtha' mi dmigs pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' yas mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams mtha' yas pas/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par blta'o/ /chu'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / me'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i
khams mtha' yas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par khong du chud par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' med/ dbus med/ mu
med par khong du chud par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzugs mu med pas/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med
par rig par bya'o/ /ma rig pa mu med pa nas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i bar du mu med pas/ shA ri'i bu/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mu med par rig par bya'o/ /phyin ci log mu med pa dang / sgrib pa mu med pa dang / lta bar song ba mu med pas/ shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
mu med par rig par bya'o/ /bdag mu med pa dang / sems can mu med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o/ /sbyin pa mu med pa dang / tshul khrims mu med pa
dang / bzod pa mu med pa dang / brtson 'grus mu med pa dang / bsam gtan mu med pa dang / shes rab mu med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu po phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong pa mu med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o/ /dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang /
rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa mu med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba
dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mu med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ mngon par shes pa mu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba mu med pa dang / rnam
par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba mu med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu/ so so'i skye bo'i chos mu med pa dang / nyan thos kyi chos mu med pa
dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mu med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mu med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ rig pa mu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba
mu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba mu med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ mu med pa dmigs su med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa mu med pa zhes bya'o/ /mtha' dmigs su med pas/ mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ mtha' med pa zhes bya ba de ni/ mu med pa'i tshig go/ shA ri'i
bu| bdag ma skyes pas/ chos thams cad mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ nam mkha' mtha' yas pas/ chos thams cad mtha' yas mu med par rig par bya'o/ /de skad
ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu dag gi yul du
'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ chos 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyang mi dmigs na/ chos ma yin pa lta ci smos/ lam yang
mi dmigs na/ lam ma yin pa lta ci smos/ tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs shing rlom sems su mi byed na/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims lta ci smos te/ khams gsum thams cad du
yang mi gtogs/ srid par 'gro ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba thams cad du yang mi gtogs/ lus dang srog la yang mi chags na/ phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams la lta ci smos te/
'khor ba'i rgyud mthar byas pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho chen po las brgal ba/ yul chen po las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul dang / bgrod pa yin no/ /yul thams
cad yul ma yin par gang gis yongs su shes pa de dang de dag ni/ rnam pa de lta bu'i skyes bu dam pa dag ste/ yul thams cad la mi chags pa de dang de dag ni/ seng+ge chen po'o/ /yul thams cad
la ma zhugs pa de dang de dag ni/ rnam pa de lta bu dag go/ yul thams cad kyis mi gos pa de dang de dag ni/ yul dang ma 'dres pa'o/ /yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa de dang
de dag ni/ ded dpon chen po ste/ shA ri'i bu/ chos 'di ni/ de dag gi yul dang / bgrod pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'khor 'di ni/ gang chos 'di la ma mos shing yul du ma gyur pa'am/
gang chos rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di la som nyi dang bcas pa'am/ the tshom dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang ngas ma mthong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ 'khor 'di ni/ chos 'di la the tshom med do//
nem nur med do/ /yid gnyis med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni/ chos 'di la yid gnyis med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ skyes bu dam pa 'di dag ni/ sems can thams cad kyi yid
gnyis yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir gnas pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di dag ni/ 'di lta bu'i chos la som nyi med de/ som nyi las yang dag par 'das pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi
ma'i dus na chos bstan pa 'di nyan pa de dag kyang chos thams cad la the tshom med par gnas te sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad pa'i phyir zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ sems can dge
ba'i rtsa ba chung du rnams ni/ chos 'di la mos par ngas ma bshad do/ /chos 'di la de dag gi go skabs med de/ 'di ni/ de dag gi nor ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/
chos bstan pa 'di gang dag gi rna lam du thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du dang ldan pa ma yin na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
byed pa lta ci smos te/ de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges par lung bstan te/ ji ltar da ltar nga seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra

dang / skyes bu chen po'i sgra dang / rang byung gi sgra sgrog pa bzhin du de dag kyang seng+ge'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag tha na chos 'di la dad pa bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub la 'dun pa bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag gi lung bstan pa yang de nyid yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ sems can gang dag chos zab mo thos
nas dga' ba bskyed cing mchog tu dga' ba dang mos pa bskyed pa de dag shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de dag kyang sems can gang chos zab mo thos nas bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing mos pa bskyed de dge ba chen po dang ldan pa ni/ shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
gang dag gi rna lam du thos par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas klog pa dang / mos pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba chen po bskyed pa dang / phyir zhing nyan pa'i phyir chos 'di la 'dun pa bskyed pa'i
sems can de dag kyang 'khor ba chen por zhugs par ngas ma bshad na/ lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan la ston pa lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
kyi theg pa la nges par ma zhugs shing ma nges pa ni/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos kyi mchog 'di la chos chung du dang ldan
pa'i sems can rnams kyi go skabs ngas ma mthong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di ni/ rgya che na/ sems can ni/ phal cher dman pa la mos shing chos chung ngu dang
ldan te/ 'di lta bu'i chos zab mo chags pa med pa la dge bar ma byas shing mi mkhas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ sems can gang dag rgya che zhing chos rgya chen po la mos pa/ theg pa
chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ dgos pa shin tu yongs su rnyed pa/ go cha chen po shin tu bgos pa/ don legs par rnam par rtogs pa/ lam chen po drang zhing nyam nga ba med pa/ tshang
tshing med pa/ mnyam pa/ smyig ma dang tsher ma med pa/ ngam grog dang g.yang sa med pa/ gtsang ba/ gnod pa med pa/ gya gyu med pa/ yon po med par zhugs pa dang / shA ri'i bu/ gang
dag 'jig rten la phan pa dang / 'jig rten la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa/
snang ba byed pa/ sems can rnams kyi mu stegs su gyur pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ phan par snying brtse ba/ phan par 'dod pa/ bde bar 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa/
sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar bar nye bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu de dag gi nor chen po yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ sems can chen po de
dag ni| chos dkon mchog 'di tshol ba ste/ 'di ni/ de dag gi nor dam pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ sems can bsod nams ma byas pa/ dman pa la mos pa/ dad
pa rab tu nyams pa rnams ni/ chos kyi nor rgya chen po 'di la mos pa mi skye'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ ngas de la dgongs te sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams kyang dman pa la mos pa dang / rgya
chen po la mos pa rnams kyang rgya chen po la mos pa khams so sor sbyar ro/ /zhes bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod yul gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yul dang / spyod yul ni/ mtha' yas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung gi khams kyi yul dang / spyod yul ni/ mtha' yas so/ /
de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yul dang / spyod yul yang mtha' yas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni/ rlung gi khams kyi yul dang / spyod yul lo//
de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yul dang / spyod yul ni/ nam mkha'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i khams kyi yul dang / spyod yul ni/ mtha' yas
so| |de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yul dang / spyod yul yang mtha' yas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni/ gang na
yang mi snang zhing chos gang mngon par grub pa'i mtshan nyid du yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang la yang mi snang zhing chos
gang mngon par grub pa'i mtshan nyid du yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni/ gzung du med cing yongs su ma
grub pas/ kha dag gi mtshan ma'i grangs su mi 'gro'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du med cing yongs su ma grub pas/ kha dog dang mtshan ma gang
gis kyang gang gi grangs su yang nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni/ chos gang yongs su
grub par mthong bar nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang yongs su grub par mthong bar nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtshan nyid med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper
na| nam mkha'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni/ chos gang gi yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid du yang nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos
gang yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid du yang nye bar 'gro ba ma yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni/ gang du yang mi chags so/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gang du yang mi chags te/ de'i phyir chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o/ /
shA ri'i bu/ chags pa med pa la ni/ mtshan nyid ci yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang gang gi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /zhes bya ba de ni/ tha snyad kyi tshig
go/ shA ri'i bu/ chags pa med pa la ni/ mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma med de/ de nyid mtshan nyid med par bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu/ chags pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni/ chags pa yongs su shes
pa'o| |de ni/ chags pa mi dmigs so/ /de ni/ chags pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de ni/ chags pa'i phyin ci ma log pa yongs su shes pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ chags pa la chags
pa med de/ de'i phyir chags pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid dang / chags pa mi dmigs pa ni/ chags pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ ye shes bstan pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos thams cad ni/ chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ chos gang gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de mtshan nyid med pa ste/ chos gang yang
mtshan nyid mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gang la mtshan nyid med pa de ni/ mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o/ /gang mtshan nyid med pa de la chags pa med do/ /gal te
chos kyi dbyings mtshan nyid cig yod na ni/ chos thams cad la chags par yang 'gyur na/ gang gi phyir chos thams cad la mtshan nyid med pa de'i phyir de dag la chags pa med de/ des
na| chos thams cad chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste/ ji skad du brjod pa de bzhin du ni ma yin no/ /gang chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de ni/ brjod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na| med pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /dben pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /mi dmigs pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /
shA ri'i bu/ chos gang chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos gang yin pa de ni/ mthong ba cir yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin zhing mi mthong bar yang ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang de sems
can rnams la chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bstan par byas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mtshan nyid med pa ste/ kun nas nyon mongs
pa ni| mtshan nyid kyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin gyi/ shA ri'i bu/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ni/ phyin ci log gis nye bar gnas pa'o/ /phyin ci log gang yin pa de ni/ mtshan nyid med pa'o//
gang mtshan nyid med pa de/ tha snyad kyis kyang mtshan nyid med de/ de mtshan nyid med pa kho na'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ rnam par byang ba gang yin pa de yang mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
shA ri'i bu/ kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid med na/ rnam par byang ba lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu/ gang kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pa de ni/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
te| de la kun nas nyon mongs pa ci yang med mod kyi/ sems can rnams ni/ phyin ci log pas kun nas nyon mongs so/ /gang phyin ci log pa de/ yang dag pa ma yin no/ /gang yang dag pa
ma yin pa de/ yang dag pa yongs su grub pa'am/ mtshan nyid med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang de ltar shes pa de ni/ rnam par byang ba zhes bya'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid
med na| rnam par byang ba lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'i chos 'di gnyis ni/ mtshan nyid med cing yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /shA ri'i
bu| chos thams cad ni/ mtshan nyid med cing yongs su ma grub pa ste/ de ni/ chags pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni/ chos thams
cad chags pa med pa yin na/ shA ri'i bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni/ chags pa med pa la chags so/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ chos thams cad chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid
de| ye shes kyi spyod yul zhes bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod yul lo/ /chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ye shes kyi spyod yul ni/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod yul mtha' yas zhes bya'o/ /gang chags pa med pa de'i yul dang / spyod yul mtha' yas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ spyod yul
zhes bya ba de ni/ spyod yul med pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ spyod yul bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyis phye ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ yul zhes bya
ba de ni| chos thams cad yul med pa'o/ /de ni/ yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin pa'o/ /med pa'i phyir chos thams cad yul med de/ chos rnams
de ltar yongs su shes pa de ni/ yul dang / spyod yul zhes bya ste/ ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin no/ /gang chos rnams de ltar yongs su shes pa ni/ gang la yang chags pa
med de| chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o/ /de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta bu'i chos 'di la grogs
mang du mi rnyed do/ /'di lta bu'i chos 'chad pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul bstan pa'o//
shA ri'i bu/ chos 'di la ni/ bden pa mthong ba'i nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa/ lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag phyir mi ldog pa
rnams ma gtogs par grogs gzhan gang yang med de/ lta ba phun sum tshogs pa chos 'di la spyod pa de dag kyang the tshom du 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' the tshom med
pa| lus mngon sum du gyur pa rnams chos 'di la bzod pa thob par 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni/ ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan
pa 'di ni/ dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi lag tu 'gro bar mi 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di ni/ sems can gang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
dag pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di ni/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/
bsam pa dge ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ byang chub kyi phyir sa bon bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
dang nye bar gnas pa/ tshul bzhin kun 'dri ba de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di ni/ gang dag bzod pa thob pa dang nye bar gyur pa dang / bzod pa
thob pa de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag lung bstan pa de dag kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ smon lam
gyi dbang gis ni/ ma gtogs so/ /gang dag lung ma bstan pa de dag kyang myur du mngon sum du lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma

smin pa'i rna lam du mdo sde 'di thos par gyur pa de dag kyang lung bstan pa nyid du rig par bya na/ gang mdo sde 'di rnyed pa dang / yi ger bri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed
pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa de dag gis mdo sde 'di mnyan pa
dang / yi ger bri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa de ni/ gnas med de/ shA ri'i bu/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba rnams kyi lag tu
'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can nam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo des chos 'di rnyed na/ spro ba chung ba dang / le lo dang / gnyid che ba dang / shes bzhin med pa dang / dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa dang / sems g.yeng ba dang / zang zing la
chags pa dang / brkam pa dang / mu cor smra ba dang / smyon thabs dang / kha phyar dang / dbang po phyal bar mi bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa dag kyang mi slu'o/ /byang chub sems
dpa' chos 'di rnyed nas bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / spro ba dang / mos pa dang / le lo med pa dang / dbang po bsdams pa dang / mu cor mi smra ba rab tu bsten par bya'o/ /dran
pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / mang du thos pa la sbyor bar bya'o/ /brtson 'grus brtsams la 'di lta bu'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su bskang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta bu'i
chos thos pa'i 'bras bu ni/ 'di ma yin te/ gang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos 'di lta bu'i chos thos na/ bag byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / yid rton par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dun pa
yongs su nyams pa dang / brtson 'grus bri ba dang / ma dris pa ston pa dang / gnod sems mang du 'gyur ba de ni/ thos pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no/ /de dag gis 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos pa ma yin
no| |shA ri'i bu/ thos zhes bya ba de ni/ yang dag pa'i nan tan gyi tshig bla dwags te/ log pa'i nan tan gyi ni ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ log par zhugs pas ni/ chos 'di thos par mi 'gyur ro//
shA ri'i bu/ thos nas khyod don la mkhas shing nan tan gyis gnas par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ log par zhugs pa rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang ji skad bstan
pa'i chos 'di la log par mi sgrub pa de ni/ chos 'di la nan tan byed ba zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag nan tan la gnas pa dag ni/ phyir ngan song du 'gro
