pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma thams cad rnam
par dag pas 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par
'gyur ro/ /shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul

'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de 'dod chags dang dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang / dri ma rnams dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs
pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum mul te/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa la
lta zhing / pad+ma gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hrIHde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni /khams gsum
thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ /nor sbyin pa ni/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos sbyin pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /
zang zing sbyin pa ni/ lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum mul te/ rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam
tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /traM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ chos thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams
cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ lus dang ngag dang sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob
par 'gyur ro/ /su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / sgom pa des dngos grub thams
cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob
nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam
tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas don gnas 'di rgya cher bstan te bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing / rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i
snying po 'di smras so/ /AH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ger bskor ba zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o/ /smon pa med
pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag bas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te bzhin 'dzum bzhin du ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po mchog 'di smras so/ /a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs
pas 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ rdo rje'i mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad kyi mnyam
pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos nyid kyi don 'di rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum nas rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor zhing rdo rje'i
'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i snod kyis
mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga
rgyas pa'o/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang /
ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /oM/ de nas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad 'dul nus pas yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid do/ /sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid do/ /sems
can thams cad chos nyid pas khro ba chos nyid do/ /sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ sems
can thams cad 'dul ba ni/ byang chub po/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te bzhin rab tu 'dzum
zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ thams cad mnyam
pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do/ /thams cad chos nyid pas shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do/ /thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin
gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can
thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin
yin pas/ sems can thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no/ /thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sems can thams cad ni/ rdo rje'i snying po can
no| dag thams cad rab tu 'byung bas sems can thams cad ni/ chos kyi snying po can no/ /sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas sems can thams cad ni/ las
kyi snying po can no/ /de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de
kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /trI/ de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzung ba dang / gzhig pa dang /
sgrub pa dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /b+h+yo/ de nas sbrang rtsi byed la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te mgrin gcig
tu rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di smras so/ /swa/ de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'chal te rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /
hA| de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med pa la mthar thug cing / mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis
brlab par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas rdo rje thams cad
mu med pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas chos thams
cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin no/ /su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / brjod
pa dang / sgom pa de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te sgrib pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin
par myur du 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje la
legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin no/ /sems can chen po legs so legs/ /bde ba chen po legs so legs/ /theg pa chen po legs so legs/ /blo gros chen po legs so
legs/ /cho ga 'di ni legs par smras/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis/ /'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs/ /cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med/ /
gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni/ /bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis/ /de dag mi sod mi tshugs so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang / /
sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin/ /ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/ /de skad gsungs nas gsang 'grub phyir/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la/ /kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas
bcas pa/ /thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos
nyid brnyes pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje'i don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ rdo rje'i don yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i sgo mchog dang po thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po dngos
grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po
dngos grub dam pa ni bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs thams
cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi khams gsum thams
cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir 'khor ba la yang
chags shing brtson 'grus che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa dang /
sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog shin tu bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog
'dug par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang / /ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas na/ /chos kun
rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ /chags la sogs pas 'dul ba ni/ /'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang / /'jig rten sdig byed de sbyang phyir/ /'khor ba
srid du bdag nyid 'bul/ /ji ltar pad+ma rab 'bar yang / /tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/ /de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis/ /'gro phan rnams la mi gos so/ /'dod chags chen po
rnam par dag/ bde ba che zhing nor che la/ /khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas na/ /sems can don rnams brtan par byed/ /lag na rdo rje/ su la la nang par langs nas mchog
dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de yid bde ba dang / bde
ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
ba'i mchog kyang grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen po'am/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i
bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i sngags kyi tshig ni/ nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams so/ /oM
byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ oM kun du bzang po'i spyod pa/ oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ oM 'gag pa med pa/ oM skye ba bzlog pa/ oM rnam par shes pa thams cad/ oM 'dod
chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid chen po/ /oM brtson 'grus kyi go cha/ oM kun tu 'gro ba/ oM rdo rje sra ba'i sems/ hUM oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ oM ngo bo nyid rnam
par dag pa/ oM chos nyid shes pa rnam par dag pa/ oM las rnam par sbyong ba/ hUM oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can/ phaT oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags/ oM spong ba'i rdo rje
can| oM hUM thams cad 'dul ba/ oM hrIHoM AHzhes bya ba'i sgo/ oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ a baM hUM oM a oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog/
oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje/ oM a sdig pa'i bcing ba thams cad choms shig /
ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las thar bar gyis shig/ oM dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje/ hUM traT sdig pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
gsang ba/ dngos grub dam pa/ rdo rje 'dzin chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ 'di ni/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du thos par
mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis mnyan pa'am/ yi ger 'bri ba'am/ yi ger 'brir gzhug pa'am/ klog pa'am/ 'chang ba'am/ bsgom pa'am/
bsti stang du bya ba'am/ ri mor bya ba'am/ mchod par mi nus so/ /gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yig 'bru gcig tsam thos na
yang sems can de dag ni/ gzhan na sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na mtha' dag rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ lag na rdo rje/ gang la la dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig

gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed la bkur sti ma byas pa dang / bla mar ma byas pa dang / bsti stang ma byas pa dang / mchod pa ma byas pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nus so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/
glegs bam la bris te spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro/ /de bskal ba bye ba mang bor skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /de la bdud sdig can
bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha gzhan rnams kyang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /yang
ba ma spangs pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der
skye'o| |de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon mang mod kyi/ ngas phyogs tsam zhig brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang /
mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kaM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/ /rgyal ba gang lags de kun gyi/ /yum ni dge ma
khyod lags te/ /khyod ni lha mo rgyal ba'i sras/ /rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /sangs rgyas yum gyur de yi mtshan/ /dge ba bdag gis brjod par bgyi/ /'byor par 'dod
pas mnyan par gyis/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / bden pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dngos po med pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid
dang / chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / chos bdag med pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / srog med
pa nyid dang / gso ba med pa nyid dang / skyes bu med pa nyid dang / gang zag med pa nyid dang / brjod par bya ba dang / brjod par bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes
pa dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / bdag gi ba med pa dang / rgyags pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / spros pa dang
bral ba dang / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa
dang / nyan thos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad bskrun pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs zad mi shes pa bsags pa dang /
ye shes 'bab pa dang / rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa dang / lha'i mig rnam par sbyong bar mdzad pa dang / lha'i rna ba rab tu dang bar mdzad pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes par mdzad pa dang /
sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par mdzad pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes par mdzad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa dang / gtsang ba dang / bsangs
pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i shugs dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs dang ldan pa dang / dbang po sbyong bar mdzad
pa dang / stobs mdzad pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po ches mdzes par byas pa dang / nor bdun sbyin par mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ston par mdzad pa dang / dbang bcu sgrub pa dang / sa bcu la gnas par mdzad pa dang / stobs
bcu yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcus mdzes par byas pa dang / shes ba bcu sgrub pa dang / bag la nyal ba bcu'i dgra 'jigs par mdzad pa dang /
bsam gtan rnams sgrub par mdzad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar mdzad pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod

pa dang / shes pa thams cad mdzad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa
nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ma byung pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gag pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / don gcig pa
ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par sgom pa dang / rab tu brtag
par bya ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang / gzhi med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / brtag par bya ba ma yin pa dang / rig par bya ba ma yin pa dang /
thog ma dang tha ma 'jig pa med par mdzad pa dang / g.yo ba med par mdzad pa dang / gnyis med pa dang / gnyis med pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / blo 'jug pa rnam par spangs
pa dang / gnyen po med pa dang / ma gos pa dang / nam mkha'i lam dang 'dra ba dang / yod pa dang med par brjod pa ma yin pa dang / rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i chos
nyid dang | mgal me bskor ba dang 'dra ba dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid do/ /su zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di 'don pa de/ ngan
song thams cad las rab tu thar par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang rtag par rgyun du
srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sped pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dran par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags
ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma/ mos pa la byams ma/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis rnam par mkhyen pa nyid/ sangs

rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag bzhes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ oM pra dz+nyai pra dz+nyai mahA pra dz+nye pra dz+nyA a ba b+ha se/ pra dz+nyA a lo ka ka re/ ad dz+nyA na bid+ya ma ne/ sid+d+he

su sid+d+he/ sid+d+h+ya ma ne/ b+ha ga ba ti/ sarbaM ga sun+d+ha ri/ b+ha ga ba te/ bad sa li/ pra sa ri ta ha ste/ sa mA swa sa ka ri/ tiSh+ThA tiSh+ThA/ kam+pa kam+pa/ tsa la tsa la/ rA ba rA ba/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ a gats+tsha
a gats+tsha/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ma bi lam+ba swAhA/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i
las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran pa dang / yid gzhungs shing shes rab mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos ma lus pa gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags dang rig sngags thams cad kyang gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba
dran pa dang / yid gzhungs shing shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
AR+yA b+ha ga ba ti pra dz+nyA pA ra mi ta pany+tsa sha ti ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bcu pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bo'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang
chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma du ma dag dang yang thabs cig go /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gang la la zhig nyan thos kyis la slob par 'dod pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang
chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab par bya ba dang / rnal 'byor du bya ba sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di nyid du rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung
bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad yang
dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang
la bslab par bya ba dang / rnal 'byor du bya ba sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid du rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
'byor/ dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du chud cing / 'dus te 'ubs la yang dag par gzhol ba yin no/ /rab 'byor
gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya/ rnal 'byor du bya ste/ nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par 'dod/
rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang mnyan par bya/
gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o/ /dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dag yin pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du chud cing / 'dus te 'ubs la
yang dag par gzhol ba yin no/ /zhes bgyi ba de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

ba dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa
nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po

med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir
'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub nyid dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi
rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ de dag ni/ dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dag lags pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du chud cing /
'dus te 'ubs la yang dag par gzhol ba rnams yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / nyan
thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dag lags pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'i nang du chud cing / 'dus te 'ubs la yang dag par gzhol ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma a la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ zab pa lags so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma a la la shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ gting dpag dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
gyis gsol pa| bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma a la la a la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ nam mkha' lta bu yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma a la la a la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi brtson pas rtogs par dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mngon par mi brtson pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / yid mi gzhungs
pa dang / don du mi gnyer ba dang / thos pa dang mi ldan pa dang / shes rab chung ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'dres pa mang ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs
pos 'dzin du bcug pa dang / dad pa tsam dang ldan pa dang / las dang po pa dang / skal pa med pa'i tshul can dang / yongs su mi 'dri ba'i tshul can dang / shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa byas
pa dang / le lo can dang / brtson 'grus chung ba dang / snying stobs chung ba dang / mos pa chung ba dang / dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par mi brtson pas mos par
dka' ba ste/ rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mos par dka' ba zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan ram/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ des
'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bzung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
gang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas rgyun mi 'chad par shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya ste/ des na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang | dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang
lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bcu pa rdzogs
so|| //rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wa ti pra dz+nyA pa ra mI ta sarba ta thA ga ta mA ta e ka a k+Sha ri nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi yum yi ge gcig ma zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab
bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/
yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge gcig ma zhes bya ba 'di/ sems
can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zungs shig/ 'di lta ste/ a/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong gi dge
'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par bstod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge gcig ma rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ko'u shi ka pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA nA ma/ bod
skad du| 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ko'u shi ka zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur
gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don
ni| 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su blta bar mi bya/ gnyis ma yin par yang ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin par yang ma yin/ blang
bar yang ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ bsnan par ma yin/ bsnan pa med par yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin par yang ma yin/
rnam par byang ba ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin par yang ma yin/ spang bar ma yin/ spang ba ma yin par yang ma yin| gnas su ma yin/ gnas ma yin par yang ma yin/
sbyor bar ma yin/ sbyor ba ma yin par yang ma yin/ 'brel bar ma yin/ 'brel ba ma yin par yang ma yin/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen ma yin par yang ma yin/ chos su ma yin/ chos ma
yin par yang ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ma yin par yang ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par yang ma yin no/ /ko'u shi ka /de bzhin
du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid mnyam mo/ /chos thams cad zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa zab bo/ /chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben no/ /chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med do/ /chos
thams cad rlom sems med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlo ma sems med do/ /chos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jigs pa med do/ /chos
thams cad bag tsha ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bag tsha ba med do/ /chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pha rol gcig go /chos thams cad
skye ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do/ /chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med do/ /chos thams cad nam mkha'
lta bu'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /gzugs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba
dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ /sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa mu med do/ /de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ /ri rab mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ /rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ /rdo rje mnyam
pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam mo/ /chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbyer med do/ /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs
su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/ /chos thams cad gsal ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsal ba med par
mnyam mo/ /chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med do/ /chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye
shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid

bco brgyad de/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong

pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ mdor na stong pa nyid 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /skar ma rab rib mar me dang / /sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang / /rmi lam glog
dang sprin lta bu/ /'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya/ /na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai AR+ya pra dz+nyA pa ra mi ta yai/ oM d+hI/ hrI/ shrI/ shru tI/ smri ti/ ma ti/ ga ti/ bi dza ye swAhA/
'gag pa med cing skye med la/ /chad pa med cing rtag pa med/ /tha dad don min don gcig min/ /'ong ba med cing 'gro med la/ /spros pa zhi bas zhi ba yi/ /rten cing 'brel par
'byung ston pa/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa/ /smra mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu dang / lha'i dbang
po brgya byin dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ko'u shi ka zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sAlpA k+Sha ra pra dz+nyA
pa ra mi tA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung du zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong khri nyis stong lnga
brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te brgya byin dang / changs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
la sogs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te dpal gyi snying po'i seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'dzum mul te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba/ gang
thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag sngags sgrub par brtson pa de
dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so/ /legs so/ /de'i phyir rigs
kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba/ gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can
thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs med
par spags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs so/ /mnyam par bzhag pa dang smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab
par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag 'od zer des reg pa sems can dmyal ba pa yan chad/ sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lta'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char yang phab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpas mnyam pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang
bral ba'i sems su bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di yang gdon par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu na ye swAhA/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chen po las khyod kyis 'di nyid thob pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog
tu gyur to/ /khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes sangs
rgyas nyid du lung yang bstan to/ /gang dag khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan pa dang / glegs bam du bris nas mchod pa byed pa

de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya tha/ dza ya dza ya/ pad+ma b+he/ a ba me/ sa ra sa ra Ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ de ba tA nu pA la ne/ bud+d+hot+ta
ra Ni/ pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba sha ma sha ma sarba sa twA na ny+tsa/ sarba karmA pa ra Na/ bi sho d+d+ha ya/ bi sho d+d+ha ya/ bud+hA a d+hi Sh+ThA ne na swAhA/ don dam pa shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum/ 'phral du sdig pa 'phrog pa/ byang chub sbyin par byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ bskal pa bye ba brgyar
yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus so/ /'di bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon
du 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
ci'i slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thabs sla ba'i phyir te/ sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs sla bas byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pany+tsa bid+sha ti ka pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA mu kha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo nyi shu rtsa
lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
ri rab kyi zom la lha thams cad kyi mtshan mo'i gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lha
dang / lha'i bu dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi'am ci dang / srin po dang / rig sngags 'chang ba
thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za dang / snang ba dang mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs shin tu mang zhing rgya che ba dpag tshad lnga'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa sha stag
dang / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs thams
cad kyis yongs su bskor cing / rig pa'i tshogs dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga
la ba der song ste phyin nas bar snang las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig
tu 'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po/ nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni/ nga'i shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yin no/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
sgo'o/ /oM kun tu bzang po'i spyod ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM 'gog pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM skye bar 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM rnam par shes pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM 'bar ba chen po'i chos
nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM brtson 'grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM rdo rje thams
cad brtan pa'i sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid
ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM las rnam par sbyong ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phaT shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /
oM hUM thams cad la 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM hrIHshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM a zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM aM ba hUM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM eM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i sgo'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //skad gsar bcad kyis kyang
bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya b+ha ga ba ti pra dz+nyA ba ra mi tA hri da ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
snying po| bam po gcig go/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
bo'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang
ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod par rnam par blta zhing / phung po lnga po de dag la yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rnam par blta'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i
bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa zab mo'i spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i spyod pa spyad par 'dod
pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste/ phung po lnga po de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rnam par rjes su blta'o/ /gzugs stong pa'o/ /stong pa nyid gzugs so/ /gzugs las stong pa
nyid gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gzugs gzhan ma yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams
stong pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de/ mtshan nyid med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gag pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba med pa/ bri ba med pa /gang
ba med pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na stong pa nyid la gzugs med/ tshor ba med/ 'du shes med/ 'du byed rnams med/ rnam par shes pa med/ mig med/ rna ba med/ sna med/
lce med| lus med/ yid med/ gzugs med/ sgra med/ dri med/ ro med/ reg bya med/ chos med do/ /mig gi khams med cing / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa nas
yid kyi khams med cing / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do/ /ma rig pa med cing / ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas rga shi med cing / rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang
med do| |sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam med/ ye shes med/ thob pa med/ ma thob pa yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas gnas te sems la sgrib pa med pas 'jigs pa med de/ phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas
mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to/ /dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ rig pa chen po'i sngags/ bla na med pa'i sngags/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa'i sngags/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags/ mi rdzun pas na/ bden par shes par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa/ tad+ya tha/ ga te ga te/
pa ra ga te/ pa ra saM ga te/ bo d+hi swAhA/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin nas legs so/ /
legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
kyang rjes su yi rang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
par bstod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / lo tsA ba dge
slong rin chen sdes bsgyur cing / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge blo dang / nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA sUR+ya
gar+b+ha mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i snying po theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na chos kyi dgon pa na dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu mang ba dang / byang chub
sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa nas 'dus pa tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang
pa zhes bya ba 'dug pa de stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de bzhin
gshegs pa la zhu ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ thabs mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyi ma zhes bya ba yod pas/ de la byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di
ltar thabs mkhas pa'i nyi ma'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ rnam pa bdun yod de/ gang zhe na/ dang po ni/ 'di ltar nyi mas myu gu smin par byed pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nyi
ma lta bus sems can rnams la byang chub kyi myu gu smin par mdzad do/ /gnyis pa ni/ nyi ma la dbri bkol med pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thugs rje ni/ sems
can thams cad la snyoms par mdzad do/ /gsum pa ni/ nyi mas nyal nyil sreg pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i lhag mthong gi shes rab kyis nyon mongs pa'i nyal nyil rnams sreg
par byed do/ /bzhi pa ni/ nyi mas 'khyags pa 'ju ba ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnyen po ye shes dang ldan pas nyon mongs pa 'khyags pa
'ju ba lta bu byed do/ /lnga pa ni/ nyi mas mun pa sel ba ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mun pa sel bar byed do/ /drug
pa ni| nyi mas gling bzhi 'khor ba ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'phrin las phun sum tshogs pas sdug bsngal gyi chu bo bzhi las thar par mdzad do/ /bdun pa ni/ nyi mas kun la
snyoms par dro ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad la rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa'i thabs ni/ dro ba'i las lta bu'o/ /gzhan
yang rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste/ des 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa
dang / mtshan ma thams cad dang rab tu bral ba dang / dngos po med pa dang / dngos po thams cad dang bral ba dang / gang zag pa med pa dang / gang zag pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /
ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
ma yin pa de nyid dang / bden pa dang / de kho na'i don la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpas yang chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa la bslab par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad rang
bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa la bslab par bya'o/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par shes par bya'o/ /ngo bo nyid kyis dben par shes par bya'o/ /rigs
kyi bu| gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo 'dzin par byed na/ de las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bsod nams kyi tshogs skye bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi tshogs
tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /mang thos dam pa'i chos la brtson/ /sems
can kun la byams par ldan/ /brtson 'grus go cha phun sum tshogs/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don la mos/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin sgom la brtson/ /bdag dang sems can
'du shes med/ /yang dag theg pa'i lam du zhugs/ /sngon gyi rgyal sras de ltar spyod/ /mkhas pas ma nor de bzhin slobs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
par bstod do/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i snying po theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya tsan+d+ra gar+b+ha pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA
ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa zla ba'i snying po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med grangs med
pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying po 'dug pa stan
las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab
par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba'i snying po/ chos thams cad dngos po dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ rtog pa med kyang gling bzhir 'khor bar byed cing mun pa rnams rab tu sel to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rtog pa med kyang phyin ci log bzhi rnams la thugs rjes 'khor zhing rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams sel bar byed kyang
mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /zla ba'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i
shes rab ni/ mos pas spyod pa'i sa'i gnas skabs na gzung bar rtog pa dang / 'dzin par rtog pa ste/ de spong bar byed pa ni/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'o| |rigs kyi bu/ de la zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mthong ba'i lam gyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te/ ye shes de ni/ rtog pa thams cad dang bral
ba'i phyir na mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol dang tshu rol gyi mtha' gang la yang mi gnas pa'i
phyir ro| |shes rab ni/ gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o/ /gzugs
la sogs pa'i chos rnams dus gsum du mi dmigs shing ma bcings ma grol bar shes par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad mtshan ma med pas/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med pa'o/ /chos thams cad skye ba med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa'o/ /chos thams cad chad pa med pas/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chad pa med pa'o/ /chos thams cad 'ong ba med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba med pa'o/ /chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa nyid pas/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gro ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rtag pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad tha dad pa
med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad don gcig pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don gcig pa nyid do/ /chos thams
cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /mdor na thams cad mtshan ma dang / rang bzhin dang / ngo bo nyid las 'das pas

ni| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags so/ /tad+ya tha/ oM pra dz+nye pra dz+nye/ mahA pra dz+nye/ tsan+d+ra pra dz+nye/ sarba shA sa ka ri swAhA/ chos rnams
thams cad rgyu las byung / /de nyid kun rdzob bden pa ste/ /rang bzhin med cing spros med pa/ /de nyid don dam spyod yul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa zla ba'i snying po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pra dz+nyA pa ra mi
tA sa man+ta b+ha dra ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu bzang po theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i dgon pa chos kyi snying po na bzhugs te/ phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa dang thabs cig go/ thams cad kyang kun tu
bzang po'i smon lam la mnga' brnyes pa/ spyod pa la gnas pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa thams cad g.yos so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag gis dbu la reg par gyur to/ /de ltar reg pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ lha rnams
kyis mthun par tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma lha mi'i dpe las 'das/ /yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu'i pha rol phyin/ /srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba khyod kyis
sgrol| |ded dpon khyod kyis rab tu bskyab par gsol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
ji ltar bslab par bya ba'i don shes rab 'dra ba dang / shes rab yin pa la bslab par bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po/ shes rab 'dra ba ni/ 'jig rten
tshogs kyi lam pa rnams kyi shes rab gang yin pa'o/ /shes rab yin pa ni/ sa dang po yan chad kyi shes rab gang yin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po theg pa
chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA badzra pA Ni ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag na rdo rje'i mdo theg pa chen
po| sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor
der byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'dug pa stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ chos thams
cad skye ba med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /gzhan yang gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis
pa dang | mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / dngos po dang bral ba dang / mi dmigs pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po
med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di no/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
yum ste/ rig pa chen po'i sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag go/ tad+ya tha/ oM mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu na ye swAhA/ su zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed na/ dus gsum
gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos rnams gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi 'bras bu tshad med pa thob par
'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang dus rtag tu 'grogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

bstod do/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag na rdo rje'i mdo theg pa chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA badzra ke tu mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo theg pa chen po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
na| bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang thabs cig go/ de nas de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dug pa de stan
las langs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos gang dang ldan pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rdo rje rgyal mtshan/ chos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mngon pa dang / 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal bar shes
pa dang / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i chos nyid du ldan pa dang / thams cad du mi rtog mi dmigs par bsgom pa'o/ /gzhan yang chos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab skye ba'i rgyu ste/
bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dang po gang zag chos smra ba'i mkhan po bsten pa dang / gnyis pa de'i dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / gsum pa don la 'jug cing sems pa dang / bzhi nga gzhan
la tshul bzhin du ston par mos pa ste/ 'di ni/ shes rab skye ba'i rgyu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad
rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas stong pa dang / bdag med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ma bcings pa dang / ma grol ba dang / snang ba med pa dang / mun
pa med pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /
gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos med ngo bo nyid du bsgom/ /shes rab skye ba'i rgyu
la mos/ /mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i/ /shes rab don la bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan
la sogs pa lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo rdzogs so// //
'di man mdo tshan bcu gsum snar thang bar du mdo a pa'i gsham du yod kyang / sde dger gsar 'gyur mdo rnams sher phyin du gtogs pa ma yin mod kyi/ phyis 'gyur ba rnams phyogs gcig tu glegs

bam 'di'i gsham du bkod 'dug cing / theg pa che chung gang yin dang / snga 'gyur dang zlos pa yod med sogs kyang ma brtags bar bzhag pa snang ba bzhin byas zhes gsungs pa ltar/ 'dir yang po dgra mtshungs ched 'dir bzhugs// //
rgya gar skad du/ d+harma tsakra pra brtan sU tra/ bod skad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i mdo/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag
'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul wA ra NA si'i drang srong lhung ba ri dwags rgyu ba'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga sde rnams bos te bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang / rab tu byung bdag /mtha' gnyis po 'di la gnas par
mi bya'o/ /gang su dag 'dir 'dod pa rnams dang / bde ba la zhen pa ni mi rigs pa dang / dman par 'gyur ro/ /so so'i skye bo rnams ni don med pa dang ldan
pa'i phyir/ gang su dag lus dub pa dang / 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal bsngags par bya ba ma yin pa rnams kyis don med pa dang ldan no/ /dge slong dag /'di
rnams ni mtha' gnyis kyi mtha' ste/ de la 'jug par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas dbu ma'i lam 'di gsungs so/ /mig
byed pa dang / ye shes byed pa dang / zhi bar byed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par
'jug go /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gsungs pa'i dbu ma'i lam gang zhe na/ mig byed pa dang / ye shes byed
pa dang / zhi bar byed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par 'jug go /dbu ma'i lam
ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad de/ brgyad po 'di ni/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang /
yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dbu ma'i
lam 'di 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gsungs so/ /mig byed pa dang / ye shes byed pa dang / zhi bar byed pa dang / mngon par
shes pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par 'jug go /'di 'ang / dge slong ngag/ sdug
bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang / rga ba'i sdug bsngal dang / na ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'chi pa'i sdug bsngal dang / mi sdug
pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang / sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang / gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa de yang sdug bsngal ba dang / mdor na nye bar len pa'i
phung po lnga sdug bsngal lo/ /'di yang / dge slong dag/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ gang sred pa 'byung ba can dang / dga' ba'i 'dod
chags dang ldan pa dang / de dang / de la mngon par dga' ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i sred pa dang / 'khor ba la sred pa dang / 'khor ba dang bral ba la
sred pa'o/ /'di yang / dge slong dag /sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ gang zhig 'di bzhin sred pa ma lus pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba
dang / 'gog pa dang / bor ba dang / so sor bsgyur ba dang / grol ba dang / grol ba la zhum pa med pa'o/ /'di yang / dge slong dag/ sdug bsngal 'gog
par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/ /'di yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dge slong dag /
'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ sngar chos ma thos pa la/ mig bskyed pa dang / ye shes bskyed pa dang / shes rab bskyed pa dang / rig pa bskyed
pa dang / snang ba bskyed pa'o/ /de yang sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ dge slong dag /'di yongs su shes par bya'o/ /sngar chos ma thos pa la/ mig
bskyed pa dang / ye shes bskyed pa dang / shes rab bskyed pa dang / rig pa bskyed pa dang / snang ba bskyed pa'o/ /'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'phags
pa'i bden pa ste/ dge slong dag/ 'di ni sngar chos ma thos pa la/ mig bskyed pa dang / ye shes bskyed pa dang / shes rab bskyed pa dang / rig pa bskyed
pa dang / snang ba bskyed pa'o/ /'di yang sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa ste rab tu spang bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag /'di ni sngar chos ma thos pa
la| mig bskyed pa dang / ye shes bskyed pa dang / shes rab bskyed pa dang / rig pa bskyed pa dang / snang ba bskyed
pa'o/ /'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ dge slong dag /'di ni sngar chos ma thos pa la/ mig bskyed pa dang / ye shes
bskyed pa dang / shes rab bskyed pa dang / rig pa bskyed pa dang / snang ba bskyed pa'o/ /'di yang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/
mngon sum du bya'o/ /dge slong dag /'di ni sngar chos ma thos pa la/ mig bskyed pa dang / ye shes bskyed pa dang / shes rab bskyed pa dang / rig
pa bskyed pa dang / snang ba bskyed pa'o/ /'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/ /dge slong dag /'di ni sngar chos ma
thos pa la/ mig bskyed pa dang / ye shes bskyed pa dang / shes rab bskyed pa dang / rig pa bskyed pa dang / snang ba bskyed pa'o/ /'di yang
sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ bsgom par bya'o/ /dge slong dag /'di ni sngar chos ma thos pa la/ mig bskyed pa
dang / ye shes bskyed pa dang / shes rab bskyed pa dang / rig pa bskyed pa dang / snang ba bskyed pa'o/ /dge slong dag /de ltar bshad pa rnam pa bzhi po
'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/ /'di ltar lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis po ji ltar gyur pa rnams ye shes mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag
pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /nga spangs te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bcas
pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang / lha dang mir bcas pa rnams las/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan med do/ /dge slong dag /
gang yang 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di ltar lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su ji ltar gyur pa'i ye shes mthong ba shin tu rnam par
dag pa yin no/ /ji ltar dge slong dag /nga ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bcas
pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang // lha dang / mir bcas pa rnams las/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas nas so sor rtogs so/ /ye shes 'di yang bdag mthong bar gyur pa dang / sngar med pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / bdag ni
lhag ma med par yang srid pa len pa med par mya ngan las 'das so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong lnga sde bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/ /'di ltar lung du bstan pa de tshun chod nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+yas rdul spangs pa dang / dri ma med
pa'i chos kyi mig skyes so/ /gang cung zad kun 'byung ba'i chos thams cad ni de 'gog pa'i chos yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab
tu bskor zhing bskor nas/ sa'i lha rnams kyis bstod pa'i sgra bsgrags so/ /dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/
'jig rten du gzhan sus kyang bskor bar mi nus pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yul wA ra NA si'i drang srong lhung ba dang / ri dwags rgyu ba'i gnas su
bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ma bskor ba bskor to/ /de nas sa'i lha'i sgra thos nas rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyis bstod pa'i sgra
bsgrags so/ /dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten du gzhan sus kyang bskor bar mi nus pa 'di ni
bcom ldan 'das kyis yul wA ra NA si'i drang srong lhung ba dang / ri dwags rgyu ba'i gnas su bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba bskor to/ /
rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyis bstod pa'i sgra thos nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bstod pa'i sgra bsgrags so/ /dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/
lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten du gzhan sus kyang bskor bar mi nus pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yul wA ra NI'i drang srong
lhung ba dang / ri dwags rgyu ba'i gnas su bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba bskor to/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bstod
pa'i sgra thos nas/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis bstod pa'i sgra bsgrags so/ /dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs
pa'am/ 'jig rten du gzhan sus kyang bskor bar mi nus pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yul wA ra NA si'i drang srong lhung ba dang / ri dwags rgyu ba'i
gnas su bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba bskor to/ /'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis bstod pa'i sgra thos
nas/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis bstod pa'i sgra bsgrags so/ /dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am /
'jig rten du gzhan sus kyang bskor bar mi nus pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yul wA ra NA si'i drang srong lhung ba dang / ri dwags rgyu ba'i gnas su bzhugs
nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba bskor to/ /dgA ldan gyi lha rnams kyis bstod pa'i sgra thos nas/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bstod
pa'i sgra bsgrags so/ /dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten du gzhan sus kyang bskor
bar ma nus pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yul wA ra NA si'i drang srong lhung ba dang / ri dwags rgyu ba'i gnas su bzhugs nas/ bla na med pa'i chos
kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba bskor to/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams gyis bstod pa'i sgra thos nas/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bstod pa'i
sgra bsgrags so/ /dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten du gzhan sus kyang bskor bar mi nus pa 'di ni
bcom ldan 'das kyis yul wA ra NA si'i drang srong lhung ba dang / ri dwags rgyu ba'i gnas su bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba bskor
to| |gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bstod pa'i sgra thos nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis bstod pa'i sgra bsgrags so/ /dge sbyong ngam/
bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten du gzhan sus kyang bskor bar mi nus pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yul wA ra NA si'i
drang srong lhung ba dang / ri dwags rgyu ba'i gnas su bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba bskor to/ /de nas skad cig dang / yud tsam de la
tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgras khyab par gyur to/ /'dir yang 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu yang dag par g.yos so/ /yang dag par rab tu g.yos so/ /yang
dag par rab tu ldeg go /bag yod par gyur/ ya mtshan du gyur/ snang bar gyur/ 'jig rten rnams su de ltar gyur to/ /'jig rten rnams su de ltar gyur te/ tshangs pas
chos bstan pa thos nas lha rnams rang rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/
