bo| |de gnyis kyis kyang rang nyid rgyal ba la bltas nas rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa ston pa'i drung du rab tu byung ngo / /de rnams las mau dgal gyi bu chen po zhag bdun nas dgra bcom
pa thob bo/ /gnas brtan shA ri'i bus zla ba phyed nas dgra bcom pa thob ste/ de gnyis po yang ston pa'i nyan thos kyi mchog tu gnas par bzung ngo / /gnas brtan shA ri'i bus dgra
bcom pa thob pa'i nyin mo nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi 'dus pa dang por byas so/ /slar yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'od ma'i tshal de nyid du bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal
po chen po zas gtsang gis bdag gi sras lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nas mchog gi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i
tshal du bzhugs so zhes pa thos nas blon po phan tshun rnams bos te 'dir shog cig /skyes bu stong phrag gcig gi 'khor khrid de/ de rgyal po'i khab du song la nga'i tshig gis
khyed kyi yab rgyal po chen po zas gtsang khyed blta bar 'dod ces brjod pas bdag gi sras khrid la shog ces smras so/ /bron pos kyang / lha| de bzhin bgyi'o zhes rgyal po'i
gsung spyi bos blangs nas/ skyes bu stong phrag gcig gi 'khor de khrid de myur ba nyid du dpag tshad drug cu'i lam du song nas stobs bcu pa 'khor bzhi'i
nang du bzhugs nas chos ston pa'i dus su gtsug lag khang du bzhugs so/ /de rgyal pos btang ba'i don re zhig bzhag nas 'khor thams cad kyi mthar 'khod de ston pa'i
chos bstan pa thos nas ji ltar 'khod pa nyid bzhin du skyes bu stong phrag gcig dang lhan cig tu dgra bcom pa thob nas rab tu 'byung bar zhus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun par
rnams 'dir shog ces phyag brkyang ngo / /thams cad de nyid du rdzu 'phrul las byung ba'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos gsum bzung nas/ lo brgya lon ba'i gnas brtan lta bur gyur
to| |dgra bcom pa thob pa'i dus nas bzung ste/ slar yang 'phags pa zhes bya ba re zhig par mar gnas par gyur te/ rgyal pos btang ba'i spring yig stobs bcu pa lam brjod
do| |rgyal pos btang ba'i mi rnams las gcig kyang ma byung zhing spring yig kyang ma thos so/ /'dir shog la khyed song cig dang / de lta bu'i nges pas blon po gzhan gcig btang
ngo| |des song nas yang sngar bzhin du 'khor dang bcas pa dgra bcom pa thob nas cang mi gsung bar gnas so/ /rgyal pos de lta bur nges pas skyes bu stong phrag re re'i 'khor
dang bcas pa'i blon po dgu btang ngo / /thams cad rang gi don rdzogs par byas nas cang mi smra bar gyur te de nyid du gnas so/ /rgyal pos spring yig tsam gyi lo rgyus kyang ma thob bo zhes bsams
nas/ mi 'di rnams nga la mi dga' ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis spring yig tsam gyi lo rgyus kyang mi brjod do/ /su zhig nga'i tshig bzhin byed par sems/ rgyal pos mi thams cad la brtags pas
nag po 'char ka mthong ngo / /de yang rgyal po'i don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i blon po yin no/ /nang mi yin no/ /shin tu thugs ches pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig la
nyin gcig tu skyes pa yin no/ /de dang lhan cig tu rtse ba'i grogs po yin no/ /de nas blon po rgyal pos pos te/ bu nag po 'char ka/ bdag gi sras blta bar 'dod pas skyes bu stong phrag
dgu btang ste mi gcig kyang ma 'ongs nas spring yig tsam gyi lo rgyus ci yang ma byung / slar yang thams cad nad kyis thebs pa yin nam/ tshe'i bar chad du gyur pa yin nam/ bdag
'tsho ba nyid kyi bar du sras po blta bar 'dod de/ bdag gi bu blta bar nus sam zhes smras so/ /lha/ nus lags so/ /gal te rab tu phyung yang blta bar nus so/ /bu khyod rab tu byung
ba'am/ ma byung yang / nga sras po blta'o zhes smras so/ /des lha legs so/ /zhes rgyal po'i gsung blangs nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ste/ ston pa chos ston pa'i dus su 'khor rnams kyi
mthar 'khod de/ chos thos nas 'khor dang bcas pa dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te dge slong gi dngos por so sor gnas so/ /ston pa sangs rgyas su gyur
nas dang po'i lo la drang srong lhung ba'i gnas su dbyar bzhugs te/ dgag dbye byas nas lteng rgyas su gshegs shing der zla ba gsum bzhugs te/ ral pa can spun rnams brtul
nas dge slong stong phrag gcig gi 'khor dang bcas pa dgun bla 'bring po'i nya la rgyal po'i khab du gshegs nas zla ba gnyis bzhugs so/ /de rnams ni grong khyer wA ra NA si nas
'ongs pa'i bar te/ zla ba lnga song zhing dgun gyi dus thams cad 'das so/ /gnas brtan 'char ka 'ongs nas zhag bdun dang brgyad song ngo / /des dbyid zlar ba'i nya la bsams pa/
dgun gyi dus 'das nas dpyid ka'i dus su sleb pa dang / mi rnams kyis 'bru rnams blangs te/ phyogs phyogs nas ldam du byung bas rtswa rnams ljang gur gyur to/ /sa gzhi dang /
nags tshal gyi shing la sogs pa me tog shin tu mang ba kha bye ba ni lam du 'gro ba'i dus so/ /stobs bcu ba'i nye du dang phrad par byed pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i dus yin no/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du nye bar song nas/ btsun pa ljon shing de ni ljang gur gyur/ /shing gi lo mas la dud pa dang / /de rnams bar nas 'od zer 'gyed pa yin/ /dpa' bo chen po
gnyen gnas gshegs pa'i dus/ /ha cang mi dro mi brang zhing / mu ge dang ni bkres pa med/ /sa steng shing rnams ljang gur gyur/ /thub ba chen po dus 'dir gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa drug
cu tsam gyis stobs bcu pa la rigs kyi grong khyer du gshegs pa'i phyir bsngags par 'os ba'i bsngags pa brjod pa'o/ /de nas ston pa la 'char kas dby-ings snyan pos gshegs pa'i bsngags
par 'os pa'i bsngags pa gsungs so/ /btsun pa/ khyod kyi yab rgyal po chen po zas gtsang blta bar 'dod pas nye du rnams rjes su 'dzin par zhu/ legs so/ /'char ka/ nye du rnams
rjes su gzung bar bgyi'o zhes dge slong gi dge 'dun la smros cig/ gshegs pa'i gnas thams cad la byi dor gyis shig ces smros shig/ btsun pa/ legs so zhes gnas
brtan song nas smras/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yul a g+ha dang / ma ga d+ha na gnas ba'i rigs kyi bu rnams stong phrag bcu dang bcas pa grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i stong phrag
bcu po thams cad zag pa zad pa'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas rgyal po'i khab nas phyi rol tu 'thon te/ nyi ma re re la dpag tshad re re bgrod cing / rgyal po'i khab nas dpag
tshad drug cu'i grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zla ba gnyis kyis sleb par dgongs shing bu nye ba yang ma yin/ myur ba yang ma yin par 'bring por gshegs so/ /gnas brtan gyis kyang
bcom ldan 'das byon no zhes/ rgyal po'i drung du smra'o zhes bsams nas nam mkha' la song ste rgyal po'i gnas su sleb par gyur to/ /rgyal por gnas brtan
gzigs nas thugs tshim par gyur te/ gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su bcug go/ rang la byed pa bzhin bcos nor sna tshogs pa'i bza' bas lhung bzed bkang nas phul
lo| |gnas brtan langs nas 'gro bar bsams ba dang / bu/ bzhugs la gsol cig/ rgyal po chen po/ ston pa dang nye bar song ste bza'o/ /slar yang / bu/ ston pa ga na
yod/ stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas rgyal po chen po nyid blta ba'i phyir byon no/ /rgyal po thugs tshim par gyur nas smras pa/ khyed 'di
gsol la bdag gi sras grong khyer 'dir ma byon gyi bar la 'di nyid nas lhung bzed du bza' ba khyer la song zhig ces smras so/ /gnas brtan gyi rgyal po'i gsung
mnyan te rgyal pos gnas brtan gyis bza' ba gsol zin pa dang / lhung bzed bkrus nas/ dri bzang po'i phye mas byugs te bza' ba mchog gis gang bar byas
nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul cig zhes smras nas gnas brtan gyi lag par byin no/ /gnas brtan mi thams cad kyis mthong ba dang / lhung bzed nam mkha'
la 'phags so/ /rang nyid kyang nam mkha' la gshegs nas bza' ba'i lhung bzed bzung ste/ ston pa'i phyag tu phul nas ston pas kyang der bza' ba la longs spyod do/ /gnas brtan
thabs 'dis nyi ma re re bzhin du bza' ba phul lo/ /ston bas kyang lam gyi bar du rgyal po nyid kyis gdugs tshod la longs spyod do/ /gnas brtan gyis kyang gdugs tshod la
longs spyod pa'i mthar nyi ma re re bzhin du de ring 'di tsam nas bcom ldan 'das byon no/ /de ring 'di tsam du bcom ldan 'das byon zhes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag
par ldan pa nyid brjod cing rgyal rigs thams cad ston pa ma mthong ba nyid kyis ston pa'i drung du rang nyid kyi sems dwangs par mdzad do/ /de'i rgyu mtshan gyis gnas brtan la bcom
ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bdag gi nyan thos kyi nang nas rigs dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog gang yin/ 'di ni 'char ka zhes pa'o/ /'di mchog tu bzung bas
shAkya pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das rjes su byon pa'i sdun la bdag cag gi nye du'i gtso bo blta'o zhes 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas
rtog cing shAkya n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba yid du 'ong ba sta gon byas so/ /der thams cad nyer bsdogs byas nas spos dang / me tog so so lag tu thogs te/ bsu
ba byed cing rgyan thams cad kyis so sor brgyan nas/ gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma /grong khyer gyi khye'u dang / bu mo sngar dang por btang ba
rnams dang / de nas rgyal po'i gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma dag de rnams kyi bar rang rang gis spos dang / me tog dang / phye ma la sogs pas mchod ba byed cing / bcom ldan
'das kyis bzhes nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' rab nyid du byon no/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis stong phrag nyi shu'i zag ba zad ba'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas gdan
bshams pa mchog la sangs rgyas bzhugs so/ /shAkya'i rigs ni nga rgyal dang ldan pa yin/ /sems rtsub pa yin pas 'di ni don grub gzhon nu/ nged dang lhan
cig gzhon nu yin no/ /nged ni phu bo yin no/ /'di ni sring mo'i bu yin no/ /'di ni tsha bo yin zhes bsams nas khye'u dang / rgyal po'i gzhon nu zhes smras te/ khyed kyi
phyag gis bdag khyod kyi rgyab tu sdod do zhes bsams so/ /de rnams de bzhin du gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa gzigs nas/ gnyen
rnams bdag la phyag mi byed bar 'dod kyang da lta phyag byed du gzhug dgos te/ mngon par shes pa'i gzhi dang / ye shes dang / bsam gtan dang ldan par 'jug
pa bskyed dgos snyam ste/ bzhengs nas nam mkha' la gshegs so/ /de rnams kyi mgo la zhabs kyi rdul lhung ba bzhin du a mra bsrung ba'i a mra'i shing gi drung du so so'i cho
'phrul dang mtshungs par cho 'phrul mdzad do/ /rgyal pos de ya mtshan che ba mthong ngo zhes smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das khyed 'khrungs pa'i nyin mo dka' thub pa nag po lha len gyis
phyag byed cing nye bar gnas pas khyed kyis zhabs bskyod pa bram ze'i spyi bo la nye bar gnas so/ /de mthong nas bdag gis kyang khyed la phyag byas so/ /'di ni bdag gi phyag dang po yin
no| |bkra shis pa'i 'bru 'debs pa'i nyin mo dzam bu'i shing gi grib ma'i dpal gyi mal stan la khyed bzhugs pa na shing dzam+bu'i grib mas ma btang bar mthong ba'i tshe yang zhabs la
phyag byas so/ /'di ni bdag gis phyag gnyis pa yin no/ /da lta ni bdag gis sngar ma mthong ba'i cho 'phrul yang mthong bas khyed kyi zhabs la phyag bgyid do/ /'di ni bdag
gi phyag gsum ba yin no/ /slar yang rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing / phyag byed bar mi nus pa'i shAkya'i rigs gcig kyang med do/ /thams cad kyis kyang
phyag byed pa nyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la nye du rnams kyis phyag byed cing nam mkha' las babs nas gdan bshams pa'i mchog gi gung la bzhugs so /
bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas nye du rnams dang 'dus par gyur pa thams cad sems gcig tu gnas so/ /de nas sprin chen po las pad+ma'i 'dab
ma la chu mi 'chags pa lta bu'i char 'bebs so/ /chu zangs gyi mdog can sa la sgra sgrogs shing 'bab bo/ /'bang bar 'dod ba rnams 'bang ngo / /'bang bar mi 'dod pa rnams
mi 'bang ngo / /thigs pa tsam yang mi ltung ngo / /de mthong nas thams cad du ya mtshan pa dang / rmad du byung ba skyes so/ /e ma ho/ ngo mtshar che/ e ma ho/ rmad du
byung ngo zhes rjod par byed do/ /ston pas 'di kho na ma yin gyi bdag gi nye du dang phrad pa na pad+ma'i 'dab ma la chu mi 'chags pa lta bu'i char 'bebs shing 'das pa'i dus
su'ang ngas phab po/ /'di'i don byung ba ni thams cad sgrol gyi skye rabs su bshad do/ /chos ston pa thos nas thams cad langs te phyag byas nas song ngo / /gcig gis kyang
rgyal po dang / rgyal tshab dang / blon po rnams sang bdag gi gnas su bsod snyoms khyer 'ong ngo zhes smra ba de rnams las gcig kyang ma byung ngo / /ston pas slar nyi ma
gnyis pa la stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir bsod snyoms la bzhud do/ /gang zhig mgron du gnyer ba dang / gang zhig mgron
du gnyer ba dang / lhung bzed khyer ba su yang med do/ /bcom ldan 'das sgo drung du 'khod de rnam par brtags pas ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs kyi grong khyer du byon nas
bsod snyoms mdzad pa bzhin du gang ji ltar rigs par mi chen po'i khyim du 'gro zhing / yang na go rim bzhin du bsod snyoms spyod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas gcig gis kyang ji ltar
rigs par gshegs bam mthong bas bdag gis kyang da ni 'di'i rigs so/ /'di sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs bzhin du bdag gis kyang rigs par gzung bar bya'o/ /bdag
gi nyan thos kyang bdag nyid bzhin rjes su slob cing bsod snyoms la rdzogs par byon no/ /'khod pa'i khyim nas bzung nas go rim bzhin du bsod snyoms la spyod do/ /'phags
pa gzhon nu don grub bsod snyoms la gshegs so zhes brjod do/ /nyis thog dang / sum thog la sogs pa'i khang bzang rnams su steng gi sgo chung phye nas mi thams cad blta
bar gyur te/ lha mo sgra gcan 'dzin gyi yum yang 'phags pa'i bu/ grong khyer 'di nyid du rgyal po chen po'i mthus gser gyi do li la sogs pa la zhon te de ring nas skra dang / kha
spu bregs shing dur smrig gi gos byon nas/ snod lag tu khyer te/ bsod snyoms la 'gro ba mdzes sam mi mdzes zhes steng gi sgo chung phye nas blta'o/ /sna tshogs ba'i 'dod chags
dang bral ba yang dag par 'bar zhing sku lus kyi 'od kyi grong khyer gyi steng thams cad snang bar mdzad de/ 'dom gang pa'i 'od kun nas bskor zhing rab tu
gsal ba dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa/ skyes bu chen bo'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dpal dpe med par rnam par gsal ba mthong ngo //
gtsug tor nas bzung nas zhabs kyi mthil gyi bar de srid do/ /dbu skra g.yas 'khyil 'jam nag snum pa dang / /dpral ba dri med nyi ma'i mthil bzhin no/ /sku dang 'tshams
pa'i shangs ni mtho ba dang / /mi yi seng ge 'od zer gsal bar mdzad/ /'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mi'i seng ge la tshigs su bcad bas mngon par bstod do/ /khyed kyi sras
ngo bsod snyoms la spyod do/ /zhes rgyal po la smras so/ /rgyal po'i sems sdug bsngal bas gos nas bzung ste myur zhing myur bar phyir 'thon ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du
'khod nas smras pa/ ci btsun pa/ bdag cag ngo tsha bas ci'i don du bsod snyoms mdzad/ dge slong 'di rnams kyi bza' ba bdag gis ster bar mi shes bsam pa yin
nam/ ci lags/ rgyal po chen po'i rigs kyi spyod pa yin no/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag shAkya'i rigs zhes bya ba'i rigs so/ /de la rgyal rigs gcig kyang
bsod snyoms byed pa'i ming tsam yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po'i rigs zhas bya ba ni khyod kyi rigs 'di yin no/ /bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ mi dgyes pa ma mdzad cig /
slar yang bdag cag gis mar me mdzad dang / kauN+Di n+ya dang / 'od srung zhes bya ba 'di sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no/ /'di rnams dang / gzhan sangs rgyas stong phrag du mas kyang bsod
snyoms spyod cing 'tsho bar mdzad la/ srang gi dbus su 'khod pa nyid do/ /bag med lhag mar byed pa med/ /chos la spyod cing legs par spyod/ /chos la spyad na bde ba 'byung / /
'jig rten 'di dang phyi mar bde/ /chos kyi rkang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di bstan cing bshad do/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i mthar rgyal pos rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob
bo| |chos spyod pa ni legs par spyod/ /nyes par spyod pa mi bya zhing / /chos spyad pa yis bde ba 'byung / /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu'o/ /slar yang chos kyi rkang pa'i tshigs
su bcad pa 'di thos nas lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /chos skyong ba'i skyes rabs thos nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'chi
ba'i dus su gdugs dkar po'i 'og tu dpal gyi mal stan gyi steng du gzims pa nyid na dgra bcom pa thob par gyur to/ /dgon par gnas nas dka' thub spyod pa
rgyal po la dgos pa med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas nas/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed bzung ste/ 'khor dang
bcas ba khang bzang chen bo'i steng du sbyan drangs nas gya nom ba'i bza' ba dang bcas ba rnams drangs so/ /gdugs tshod zin pa'i mthar sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ma ma gtogs
ba'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas ba thams cad 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas so/ /gzhan yang / des 'khor gyi mi rnams la 'phags pa'i bu la phyag gyis zhes
brjod nas/ gal te kho mo la yon tan yod na 'phags ba'i bu rang nyid kyi gnas su 'byon no/ /byon ba nyid na de la phyag byed do zhes brjod nas ma 'ongs so/ /rgyal pos
lhung bzed bzung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos mchog gnyis dang bcas pa rgyal po'i bu mo'i khang bzang du gshegs te/ rgyal bo'i bu mo rang nyid ji ltar mos pa'i phyag
byed cing gzhan dang 'gal ba cung zad kyang ma byed ces nas gdan bshams ba mchog gi gung la bzhugs so/ /de myur du 'ongs nas byin pa bzung ste/ zhabs kyi steng
du mgo bo bzhag nas ji ltar 'dod ba'i phyag byas so/ /rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu mos bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba mang bos yon tan la sogs pas/ yon tan dang
ldan par brjod nas/ btsun pa/ bdag gi bu mos nyid kyis gos ngur smrig gyon pa thos nas/ de nas bzung ste deng gi bar du gos dur smrig gyon no/ /nyid kyis gdugs tshod lan
gcig gsol ba thos nas bu mos kyang bza' ba lan gcig zos so/ /nyid gyis mal stan chen po spangs pa thos nas/ nyal khri chung ba la nyal lo/ /nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba
dang / spos la sogs pa la sred pa med pa thos nas/ me tog gi phreng ba dang / spos la sogs pa la chags ba med ba skyes so/ /rang gi nye du rnams bdag gis gso'o zhes
'phrin bskur nas/ gnyen gcig la yang lta ba mi 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni bdag gi bu mo yin no zhes gsol to/ /rgyal po
chen po/ ya mtshan mi che'o/ /'di da lta khyed srung bar byed pa'i rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes yongs su smin par rang gis bsrung ngo / /sngar bsrung ba med cing ri la sogs
pa la 'gro ba na/ ye shes yongs su ma rdzogs par rang gis bsrungs so zhes gsungs nas/ mi'am ci zla ba'i skyes rabs gsungs te/ gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs
so| |nyi ma gnyis pa la rgyal bu gzhon nu dga' bo rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang / khang pa gsar ba'i nang du zhugs te bkra shis pa'i bag ma blangs nas nye bar gnas
so| |de'i khyim du gshegs nas/ gzhon nu/ lhung bzed gzung zhig ces rab tu dbyung bar dgongs nas bkra shis brjod de/ gdan la bzhengs
nas gshegs so/ /ljongs kyi dge ba'i bu mos 'gro ba mthong ngo / /'phags pa'i bu myur du shog ces brjod nas blta'o/ /des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed de
bzung bar ma nus nas gtsug lag khang nyid du gshegs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de la 'dod pa med pa nyid kyang rab tu 'byung ba byed do/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das
grong khyer ser skyar gshegs shing nyi ma gsum pa la dga' bo rab tu byung bar byas so/ /nyi ma bdun ba la sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mas/ gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan nas /
bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du btang ngo / /bu| stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di rnams ltos/ gser gyi kha dog can gyi tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi mdog
can/ dge sbyong 'di ni khyed kyi yab bo/ /'di la gter chen po yod cing de 'thon pa nas bzung nas gter mthong ba med do/ /song la nor slongs shig /bdag khyed kyi bu
gzhon nu yin no/ /rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob nas 'khor los bsgyur ba la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/ /bdag la nor gyi don du nor stsal du gsol/ /yab kyi nor/ bu bdag
yin no/ /zhes gsol cig ces smras pa dang / gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar song ste/ yab kyi drung du dga' bskyes so/ /sems spro bar gyur to/ /dge sbyong de khyed kyi grib ma ni
de'o zhes brjod nas/ gzhan yang / rang gi rigs pas brjod cing 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod kyi mthar rjes su yi rang ba mdzad nas gdan la bzhengs te gshegs
so| |gzhon nus bdag la dge slong nor stsal du gsol/ bdag la dge slong nor stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su 'brang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu
phyir log la/ nga'i rjes su ma 'gro zhes pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das dang 'grogs nas byon te/ ldog par ma nus nas/ gzhon nu bcom ldan
'das dang lhan cig kun dga' rab nyid du phyin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsams pa/ 'di yab kyi nor 'dod cing 'jig rten pa'i nor ni 'tshe ba dang bcas pa yin
da ni gzhon nu la byang chub snying po des thob pa'i 'phags pa'i nor rnam pa bdun byin na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gyi bdag po byed par 'gyur bar dgongs nas/
tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu pos te/ de'i phyir na shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin rab tu phyung zhes brjod nas rab tu byung ba byas so/ /slar yang rgyal po gzhon nu'i
sdug bsngal cher skyes te bsran par ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas su phyin te/ btsun pa 'phags pa/ ma dang / pha yis rjes su ma gnang
ba'i bu rab tu 'byung bar byed pa ma legs so zhes dam pa bslangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dam pa byin no/ /slar yang nyi ma gnyis pa la rgyal po'i gnas su gdugs
tshod gsol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /rgyal pos btsun pa nyid dka' ba spyod pa'i dus su lha gcig bdag gi drung du nye bar 'ongs nas khyed kyi bu dus las 'das
so| |zhes smras so/ /de'i tshig la yid ches pa med cing / bdag gi sras byang chub ma thob bar du dus las 'da' bar mi byed do/ /de'i tshig bdag gis bkag go zhes brjod
do| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta ji ltar khyod yid ches par byed/ slar rus pa mthong nas khyed kyi bu shi'o zhes zer ba la yid ches par ma byas so/ /'di'i
don 'byung ba ni chos skyong ba chen po'i skyes rabs su bshad do/ /gtam gyi mthar rgyal pos phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas so/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yab 'bras
bu gsum la so sor gnas nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor du byas so/ /slar yang rgyal po'i khab du gshegs nas/ bsil ba'i tshal du bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin gyis shing rta lnga brgya'i nor khyer nas rgyal po'i khab du rang nyid dga' ba'i grogs kyi khang par song ste/ de sa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byon no zhes pa
thos nas shin tu snga bar lha'i mthus sgo phye ste/ ston ba'i drung du nye bar song nas chos thos te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /nyi ma gnyis pa la sangs rgyas
la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin pa chen po phul lo/ /gnyan yod du gshegs pa'i phyir du ston pa'i drung du dam bca' bslangs nas sar gyi lan dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i
gnas su 'bum phrag re re'i nor byin nas dpag tshad re re'i gtsug lag khang byas so/ /rgyal byed tshal bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi dbyig gis nyos nas las kha gsar pa byed
cing dbus su stobs bcu pa'i dri'i gtsang khang byed do/ /de la bskor ba rnams la gnas brtan chen po brgyad cu'i bzhugs gnas so/ /chig thog dang / nyis thog dang / khang
pa ring po dang / bsti gnas la sogs pa'i bzhugs gnas dang / rdzing bu dang / 'chags dang / mtshan mo'i bzhugs gnas dang / nyin mo'i bzhugs gnas so/ /bye ba
phrag bco brgyad kyi nor spel te/ yid du 'od pa'i sa phyogs yid la 'thad pa'i gtsug lag khang byed do/ /stobs bcu pa byon pa'i phyir du po nya pa btang ngo / /ston pas ngo
nya ba'i 'phrin gsan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po 'khor du byas te/ rgyal po'i khab nas phyir byon te go rim bzhin du grong khyer mnyan yod
du byon no/ /gtso bo chen po yang gtsug lag khang chen po sta gon byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal byed tshal du byon pa'i nyin mo bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan no/ /slar
yang brgyan pa nyid kyi gzhon nu lnga brgya dang bcas pa btang ngo / /de 'khor dang bcas ba kha dog lnga'i gos yang dag par 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan brgya thogs nas stobs bcu
ba'i mdun du song bar gyur to/ /de rnams kyi phyi ma la legs bzang chen mo dang / legs bzang ma chung ba ste bu mo gnyis/ gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang bcas pa gser gyis gang
ba'i bum pa lag par thogs nas phyir 'thon no/ /de'i phyi ma la tshong dpon gyi chung ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bud med lnga brgya dang bcas pa gser gyis gang ba'i sder
ma chen po thogs nas phyir 'thon to| /thams cad phyin nas tshong dpon rang nyid gos bzang po gyon no/ /de bzhin du gos bzang po gyon pa'i tshong dpon lnga brgya dang bcas pa
bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor dge bsnyen 'di rnams mdun du byas nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po rnams 'khor du byas te/ rang
nyid kyi sku lus kyi 'od kyis gser gyi bcud kyi gong bu lta bu dang mtshungs pa dang / nags tshal gyi bar du snang bar mdzad cing mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol pa sangs rgyas kyi dpal
zla med cing mtshungs pa med pa rgyal byed 'tshal gyi nang du byon no/ /de nas mgon med zas byin gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gtsug lag khang 'di ji ltar bu la dbul bar gyi/ khyim
bdag/ gtsug lag khang 'di 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul cig /legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes tshong dpon chen pos gser gyi ril ba spyi blugs
blangs nas stobs bcu pa'i phyag tu chu bsgrengs te/ rgyal byed tshal gyi gtsug lag khang 'di'i 'gro ba dang /'ongs pa'i phyogs bzhi'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin
zhes phul lo/ /ston pas gtsug lag khang bzhes nas rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do/ /grang dang dro bas mi nyams shing / /de ltar ri dwags la sogs pa'i/ /sdig sbrul dang ni sbrang
bu dang / /ba mo dang ni char pas so/ /de ltar rlung dang shin tu dro/ /so sor lus la gos pa dang / /khang nang gnas nas bde ba skyes/ /khang bar bsam gtan lhag mthong
rnams/ /dge 'dun gtsug lag khang 'bul ba/ /sangs rgyas mchog gis bsngags par mdzad/ /skyes bu mkhas pas de yi phyir/ /bdag nyid kyi ni phyir du ni/ /dga'
bas gtsug lag khang byed pa/ /mang du thos pa gnas pa yin/ /de rnams kyi ni bza' dang btung / /gos dang mal cha stan dang ni/ /de rnams
sems ni drang bos dbul/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems gyis so/ /des ni de la chos bstan to/ /sdug bsngal thams cad nyer zhi'i phyir/ /gang de'i chos ni rtogs pa dang / /rten
med mya ngan 'das par byed/ /ces bya ba'i gtsug lag khang gi phan yon bshad do/ /mgon med zas sbyin gyis nyi ma gnyis pa nas bzung nas sbyin pa gtong ba'i mgo brtsams
so| |sa khams byas pa'i khang bzang ni zla ba bzhis grub bo/ /slar yang mgon med zas sbyin gyi gtsug lag khang chen po zla ba dgus grub bo/ /gtsug lag khang chen po la yang
bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad nyid song ngo / /'di la gtsug lag khang chen po 'di nyid la bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bzhi'i nor yongs su btang ngo / /slar yang 'das pa'i bcom ldan
'das rnam par gzigs kyi dus su tshong dpon kun gyi grogs zhes bya bas gser gyi glang bo'i rkang ba'i rmig rjes lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas/ gnas 'di nyid du dpag tshad gcig
gi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor can gyi dus su/ dpal 'phel zhes bya ba'i tshong dpon gyi bsu gser gyi sder ma rgyun mi 'chad pas nyos
ba'i sa gzhi'i gnas de nyid du rgyang grags bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam gyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyob kyi dus su tshong dpon bkra shis zhes
bya bas gser gyis gzhi gser gyi rkang pa'i rjes lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du dpag tshad phyed kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das log par dad
sel gyi dus su tshong dpon 'pho ba med pa zhes bya bas gser gyi pha gu lta bu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags bzhi'i tshad kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra
ba byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das gser thub kyi dus su tshong dpon drag po zhes bya bas gser gyi rus sbal rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags gnyis
kyi tshad kyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi dus su tshong dpon bkra shis bzang po zhes bya bas gser gyi pha gu rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bus sa gzhi nyos nas
gnas de nyid du rgyang grags gcig gi tshad kyi kun dga' rab byas so/ /slar yang bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi dus su tshong dpon mgon med zas sbyin gyis bye ba phrag bco
brgyad kyi dbyig gis gser gyi 'dra men du byas pa rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bus sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags byed kyi kun dga' rab byas so/ /gnas 'di sangs
rgyas thams cad kyis ma spangs pa'i gnas yin no/ /'di ltar byang chub chen po'i snying po'i drung du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa ji srid pa
nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa de srid du gang dang gang gi gnas su bcom ldan 'das bdag bzhugs pa 'di ni nye ba'i gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'o/ /de'i lus
kyis skyes rabs thams cad du bsngags par mdzad de/ skyes ba rabs kyi gleng gzhi'i bshad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas dang /
mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shA kya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur
cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig/ //rgya gar skad du/ A TA nA Ti ya sU tra/ bod skad du/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi
mdo/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung
po'i ri la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po gnod sbyin mang po'i sde dang / dri za mang po'i sde dang / grul bum gyi sde mang po dang / klu'i sde mang po rnams phyogs
bzhi bsrung zhing gnas so/ /phyogs bzhir tshan tshan du gnas so/ /phyogs bzhi skyob cing gnas so/ /mtshan mo 'ongs te/ kha dog sna tshogs pa can gyis bya rgod phung po'i ri 'ba'
zhig snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gnod sbyin de rnams las kyang / gang la
las bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun gsol te/ bsnyun gsol nas/ ji ltar snying po dang / snying
po med pa'i gtam 'dri zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag gis
ming dang rigs spyod cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
bus| bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gang la la
zhig bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lam dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/ /
gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur pa'i
rgyu gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis srog gcod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / ma byin bar len pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / 'dod pa log par
spyod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / brdzun du smra ba sbong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / myos bar 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba'i chos bstan pa mdzad la/ gnod sbyin
gang de rnams srog gcod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur ba dang / ma byin par len pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / 'dod pa log par spyod pa spong ba la mi
dga' bar gyur pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / myos bar 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pas/ de rnams la
mi dga' zhing mi 'dod par gyur to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ji snyed yod pa rnams 'brog dgon pa'i lam du zhugs nas nyal ba dang / 'dug pa la
brten no/ /sgra med cing dbyangs med par dben par gnas shing 'du 'dzi'i 'tshe ba med do/ /so sor dge sbyong rnams mthun par gnas so/ /de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams
kyi gnas yod do/ /gang zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la ma dad par gyur te/ de rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bslab par bya ste/
lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrung du gsol/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang /
bde ba dang / legs par gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung ba'i tshul gyis gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba
shes te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig ces gsol to/ /spyan ldan dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'byung po rnams
la brtse ba yi/ /gtsug tor can la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon med rnams la gdung ba yi/ /thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa yi/ /'khor
ba 'jig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram ze dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /gser thub la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnam grol mdzad pa yi/ /'od srung la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /
shAkya'i sras ni dbal dang ldan/ /nyi ma'i rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal kun las sgrol mdzad ba/ /gang zhig chos ni rab ston mdzad/ /
gang yang 'jig rten par gyur pa/ /ji lta ba bzhin gzigs gyur ba'i/ /de rnams la ni phram med/ /'jigs pa med pa chen po'o/ /gang zhig gau tam phyag byed pa/ /lha dang mi
la phan pa yin/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /'jigs pa med pa chen po ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /gang zhig tu ni nub cing 'char/ /gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa/ /
de ni mtshan mor 'gyur ba yin/ /gang du nyi ma shar gyur pa/ /de ni nyin mo zhes brjod do/ /gting ni zab ba'i rgya mtsho yi/ /de ni chu yi bcud bzang ngo / /de ltar der ni skyes
gyur pa'i/ /rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no/ /'dir ni shar gyi phyogs kyi ni/ /skye bo rnams la 'di brjod de/ /de yi phyogs ni kun skyong ba'i/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen
ldan| |dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /ming ni rgyal po yul 'khor skyong / /dri za 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming
ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang ngo zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go /de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i gnyan gyi sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang
bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal| |skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams
khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di brjod do/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /sangs
rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang yang yi dwags rjod byed pa/ /phra ma rgyab kyi sha can dang / /srog gcod pa la chags pa dang / /skye bo ma lus 'joms pa'o/ /'dir ni lho yi phyogs
gnas pa'i/ /skye bo rnams la 'di skad brjod/ /de yi gnas ni yongs skyong ba/ /rgyal po chen po grags ldan pa/ /grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes
bya| |grul bum 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni
dgu bcu rtsa gcig go /de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i rgyud kyis sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen
khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di brjod
de/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig/ rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma'i
dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /gang nas gang du shar gyur pa/ /der ni nyin mor 'gyur ba ste/ /nyin mo zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa/ /de ni mtshan mor
rjod par byed/ /gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi/ /de yi chu ni bcud bzang ngo / /de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i/ /rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no/ /'dir ni nub kyi phyogs kyi ni//
skye bo rnams la 'di brjod de/ /de yi phyogs ni kun skyong ba'i/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste/ /'di yi ming ni mig mi bzang / /klu yi
'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu
rtsa gcig go /de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang
mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir
de ltar 'di brjod de/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig/ rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig byang phyogs
sgra mi snyan/ /lhun po blta na sdug ri dga'/ /der skyes ba yi mi rnams ni/ /bdag gis yongs su bzung ba med/ /de rnams sa bon 'debs pa med/ /rmo ba yang ni med pa yin/ /
dka' spyad med par 'bras smin zhing / /mi rnams yongs su longs spyod do/ /spun med ma grugs shin tu dag /dri bzang 'bras ni 'bras bur ldan/ /'bras kyi 'o ma la 'tshed
cing / /de bzhin bcos nas longs spyod do/ /ba lang rkang gcig la zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /rkang pa gcig ba'i phyug zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs
su 'gro bar byed/ /bud med kyi ni bzhon pa la/ /zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro/ skyes pa'i gzhon pa la zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /gzhon nu ma
yi bzhon pa la/ /zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro /gzhon nu'i gzhon pa la zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /bzhon pa de rnams la zhon nas/ /phyogs
kun du ni rjes su 'gro/ gtso bo rgyal po khyed med do/ /glang chen bzhon dang rta yi bzhon/ /lha yi gzhon pa la gnas nas/ /khang bzang dang ni phyogs dang ni/ /rgyal po chen bo
grags dang ldan/ /de'i yang grub pa'i grong khyer ni/ /dri med bar snang la gnas pa/ /lcang lo can dang ku sha'i grong / /pha rol ku sha'i grong dang ni/ /
nA TA'i grong dang pha rol gyi/ /ku shi ta yi grong yin no/ /byang gi phyogs na thams cad rgyas/ /skye bo'i tshogs pa mang po gnas/ /dgu bcu rtsa dgu grong mkha' la/ /rgyal po'i
pho brang lcang lo can/ /slar yang drang srong chen po dang / /rgyal po chen po lus ngan bo/ /bi sA NA zhes ba rgyal po'i pho brang ngo / /de'i phyir rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /
lus ngan po zhes brjod do/ /so sor rab tu gsal zhing zhi ba dang / de dang der ni de dang de mdangs dang / de'i gzi brjid dang / dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal po
stobs dang ldan pa'i ming ngo / /sa gzhi yang ni bcud ldan no/ /gnas der sprin rnams char 'bebs par byed do/ /der ni b+ha ga la ba tI zhes pa'i rdzing bu'o/ /gang du
gnod sbyin tshogs dang lhan cig tu gnas so/ /der ni rtag tu shing gi 'bras/ /sna tshogs bya rnams lhan cig gnas/ /rma bya khrung khrung sgra sgrogs shing / /khu byug
rnams ni tshan tshan gnas/ /shang shang te'u sgra sgrogs shing / /de nas yang ni ngur pa dang / /gong mo nags kyi bya gag ni/ /nags kyi rdzing bur gnas pa'o/ /ne tso ri
skegs de sgra 'byin/ /daN+Da mA Ta bya dkar ni/ /dus kun du ni mdzes par byed/ /lus ngan rgyal po'i rdzing rtag mdzes/ /'di ni byang gi phyogs kyi yul/ /skye bo rnams ni 'di bzhin
brjod/ /de yi phyogs ni yongs skyong ba'i/ /rgyal po chen po grags dang ldan/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag bo ste/ /'di yi ming ni lus ngan po/ /gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas
pa ni| |glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ de yang
sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu
mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de/ /rgyal ba gau tam
phyag gyis shig /rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dir ni drang srong chen pos lcang lo can gyi pho brang dang
bcas pas srungs shig /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ /dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang / legs
bar gnas so/ /drang srong chen po/ gang su dag dge slong dang bcas pa'am/ dge slong ma dang bcas pa'am/ dge bsnyen dang bcas pa'am/ dge
bsnyen ma dang bcas pa rnams la/ 'dir lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis de bsrung ba dang yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad yid la zungs shig /de'i yang mi ma yin rnams so/ /
gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rma/ gnod sbyin
gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ dri za pho'am/ dri za mo'am/ dri za'i bu mo'am/ dri za'i blon po chen po'am/ dri za'i 'khor ram/ dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bum pho'am/
grul bum mo'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo'am/ grul bum gyi blon po chen po'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor ram/ grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ klu
pho 'am/ klu mo'am/ klu'i bu pho'am/ klu'i bu mo'am/ klu'i blon po chen po'am/ klu'i 'khor ram/ klu'i g.yog 'khor ram/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'gro'am/
rjes su 'gro'am/ rjes su 'gro ba dang / sdod pa dang / lhan cig tu sdod pa dang / gnas pa dang / lhan cig tu gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang / lhan cig tu nyal ba rnams
ni| drang srong chen po/ 'di rnams ni mi ma yin zhes bya'o/ /grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ bkur stir byed pa'am/ bsti stang du byed pa la/ drang srong chen po/ mi ma yin rnams kyis
de thob pa ma yin no/ /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can zhes bya ba la gzhi 'am/ gnas sa med do/ /drang srong chen po/ mi ma yin rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis lhan cig tu gnas
pa'ang mi thob bo/ /drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang / mi ma yin rnams kyis bka' mnyan par bya'o/ /drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang / mi ma yin rnams kyis bdag la phan pa rdzogs
pa dang / pha rol la smod pa dang / rtsod pa dang / drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang / mi ma yin rnams la snod mer rab tu 'bar ba mgo la bskon pa dang / drang srong chen po/ gzhan
yang / mi ma yin rnams kyi mgo po tshal ba bdun du gshegs par byed do/ /drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang / mi ma yin ni gtum pa dang / drang pa dang / khro ba'o/ /de rnams kyis
'di ltar rgyal po chen po la rjod par byed do/ /rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na skyes bu la sogs pa la rjod par byed do/ /rgyal po'i skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na/ de'i
'og ma'i skyes bu rnams la rjod par byed do/ /drang srong chen po/ de yang mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po la 'gal ba smra ba'o/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ mang ga d+ha'i
yul gyi rgyal po la chom rkun byung na de ma thag tu rgyal po la rjod par byed do/ /rgyal po la brjod par ma nus na/ rgyal po'i skyes bu la rjod bar byed do/ /
skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed pa bzhin no/ /drang srong chen po/ de yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po la chom rkun gyis gnod pa byed par brjod do/ /
drang srong chen po/ 'di lta bu mi ma yin yod pa rnams gtum pa dang / drag pa dang / khro ba'o/ /de ma thag tu rgyal po rnams la rjod par byed do/ /rgyal bo chen po la brjod par
ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/ /skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/ /drang srong chen po/ de ni mi ma yin rnams rgyal po
chen po rnams la 'gal bar rjod par byed do/ /drang srong chen po/ mi ma yin gang zhig gnod sbyin pho'am/ gnod sbyin mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho'am/ gnod sbyin gyi
bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram/ gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ dri za pho'am/ dri za mo'am/ dri za'i bu pho'am/ dri
za'i bu mo'am/ dri za'i blon po chen po'am/ dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bum pho'am/ grul bum mo'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo'am/ grul
bum gyi blon po chen po'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor ram/ grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ klu pho 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu'i bu pho'am/ klu'i bu mo'am/ klu'i blon po chen po'am/ klu'i
'khor ram/ klu'i g.yog 'khor ram/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma rnams 'gro ba'am/ rjes su 'gro ba'am/
rjes su 'gro ba dang / sdod pa dang / lhan cig tu sdod pa dang / gnas pa dang / lhan gcig tu gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang / lhan cig tu nyal ba dang / 'di rnams ni gnod sbyin
rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang / sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang / nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgra cher sgrogs par
byed pa'o/ /'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'di rnam par 'tho 'tsham par
byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'di gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'di rnam par gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed do/ /gnod sbyin rnams dang /
gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang / sde dpon chen po rnams gang zhe na/ dbang po zla ba chu za dang / /b+hA ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag /tsan+dan dang ni 'od mchog
dang / /mgul ba mdzes dang mgul nges dang / /skye dgu'i bla mar gyur ba dang / /lha las byung ba'i kha lo ba/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /mi rgyal rgyal
ba'i khyu mchog dang / /de bzhin ri dang gangs can dang / /gang ba smin drug phug dang ni/ /'tsho ba dang ni btang bzung dang / /sna tshogs bshes gnyen gnya' shing 'dzin/ /
sa skyong rab tu rtogs ba dang / /ngo tsha mig dang khang pa dang / /lnga len gtum po A la pa ka/ srid sgrub yid bzang bzhin bzang dang / /zho gdong nor bu spyod/ /de
bzhin dbang phyug dang bcas so/ /'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang / sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol
bar byed pa dang / nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o/ /'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas/ gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang /
gnod sbyin 'di 'tshe bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par mtho 'tsham par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'di rnam
par gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed do/ /drang srong chen po/ 'dis ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig/ dge slong dang / dge
slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tsho ba med pa dang / bde ba dang legs par gnas so/ /drang srong chen po/ da ni bdag cag rnams
'gro bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag rnams ni bya ba mang ba dang / byed pa mang bas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyed rnams da ni 'gro bar gyis shig /
de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas der mi snang bar gyur to/ /gnod sbyin de rnams kyang langs nas gang su dag
gis| bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun gsol ste/ bsnyun gsol nas snying po
dang | snying po med pa ji ltar zhes zhus pa de rnams de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /
gang la la zhig gis ming dang / rigs rnam par dpyad nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang la la zhig cang mi smra bar gyur te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /lcang lo can gyi pho
blang gi mdo las/ skabs rab mchog dang po'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i mtshan ma 'das nas/ dge slong rnams bos nas/ dge
slong dag/ 'di'i mtshan mo rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams dang / dri za'i sde mang po dang / grul bu ma gyi sde
mang po dang / klu'i sde mang po dang / phyogs bzhi bsrung zhing gnas so/ /phyogs bzhir tshon tshan du gnas so/ /phyogs bzhi skyong zhing gnas so/ /mtshan mo 'ongs te kha dog sna
tshogs pa can gyis bya rgod phung po'i ri 'ba' zhig snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste song nas/ nga la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /
dge slong dag dang / gnod sbyin de rnams gang la la zhig gis nga la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag gis nga la bsnyun gsol te/ bsnyun gsol
nas ji ltar snying po dang / snying po med pa'i gtam 'dri zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag gis nga la thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag gis
ming dang rigs dpyod cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong dag dang / rgyal po chen
po rnam thos kyi bus nga la 'di skad ces gsol nas/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa yod pa rnams btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs pa
gang la zhig bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lam dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la
zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan
'das kyis srog gcod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / ma byin par len pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / 'dod pas log par spyod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / brdzun du smra
ba spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba'i chos bstan pas so/ /gnod sbyin gang dag de rnams btsun pas srog gcod pa spong ba la mi dga'
bar gyur pa dang / ma byin par len pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / 'dod pas log par spyod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spong ba la mi
dga' bar gyur pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pas so/ /de rnams la mi dga' zhing mi 'dod par gyur to/ /btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das/ nyan thos ji snyed yod pa rnams 'brog dgon pa'i lam du zhugs nas nyal ba dang / 'dug pa dang brten to/ /sgra med cing dbyangs med par dben
par gnas shing 'du 'dzi'i 'tshe ba med do/ /so sor dge sbyong rnams mthun zhing gnas so/ /de na gnod sbyin ma rungs rnams kyi gnas yod do/ /gang zhig bcom ldan 'das
kyi gsung rang lam dad par gyur te/ de rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bslab par bya ste/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrung du gsol/ dge
slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang / legs par gnas so/ /dge
slong rnams la bdag gis cang mi gsung ba'i tshul gyis gnang ba byin no/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus gnang ba byin par shes te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar lcang
lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig ces gsol to/ /spyan ldan dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams la brtse ba
yi| |gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon med rnams la gdung ba yi/ /thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa yi/ /'khor ba
'jig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram ze dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /gser thub la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnam grol mdzad pa yi/ /'od srung la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /shAkya'i
sras ni dpal dang ldan/ /nyi ma'i rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol mdzad pa/ /gang zhig chos ni rab ston mdzad/ /gang yang 'jig rten par gyur
pa| |ji ltar ba bzhin gzigs gyur pa'i/ /de rnams la ni phra ma med/ /'jigs pa med pa chen po ni/ /gang zhig gau tam phyag byed pa/ /lha dang mi la phan pa yin/ /rig
pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /'jigs pa med pa chen po ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /gang zhig tu ni nub cing 'char/ /gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa/ /der ni mtshan
mor 'gyur ba yin/ /gang du nyi ma shar gyur pa/ /der ni nyin mo zhes brjod do/ /gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi/ /de yi chu yi bcud bzang ngo / /de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i//
rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no/ /'dir ni shar gyi phyogs kyi ni/ /skye bo rnams la 'di rjod do/ /de yi phyogs ni yongs skyong ba'i/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /dri
za rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /ming ni rgyal po yul 'khor skyong / /dri za 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni
gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go /de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas
ni| |'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung pa la//
mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di brjod do/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyi'o/ /rig pa dang ni
zhabs su ldan/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang yang yi dwags rjod byed pa/ /phra ma rgyab kyi sha can dang / /srog gcod pa la chags pa dang / /skyes bu ma lus 'joms
pa'o| |'dir ni lho yi phyogs gnas pa'i/ /skye bo rnams la 'di skad brjod/ /de yi gnas ni yongs skyong ba/ /rgyal po chen po grags ldan pa/ /grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste//
ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya/ /grul bum 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po
zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go /de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i rgyud kyi sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni
phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di
ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di brjod do/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal
lo| |nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /gang nas gang du shar gyur pa/ /der ni nyin mor 'gyur ba ste/ /nyin mor zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa/ /de ni mtshan
mor rjod par byed/ /gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi/ /de'i chu yi bcud bzang ngo / /de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i/ /rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no/ /'dir ni nub kyi phyogs kyi ni//
skye bo rnams la 'di brjod de/ /de'i phyogs ni kun bskyod pa'i/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste/ /'di yi ming ni mig mi bzang / /klu yi 'khor
dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/
de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyid do/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /
skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan ba'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di
brjod do/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig byang phyogs sgra mi
snyan| lhun po blta na sdug ri dga'/ /der skyes pa yi mi rnams ni/ /bdag gir yongs su bzung ba med/ /de rnams sa bon 'debs pa med/ /rmo ba yang ni med pa yin/ /
dka' spyad med par 'bras smin nas/ /mi rnams yongs su longs spyod do/ /spun med ma grugs shin tu dag /dri bzang 'bras ni 'bras bur ldan/ /'bras kyi 'o ma la 'tshed
cing / /de bzhin btsos nas longs spyod do/ /ba lang rkang gcig la zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /rkang pa gcig pa'i phyugs zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs
su 'gro bar byed/ /bud med kyi ni bzhon pa la/ /zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro /skyes ba'i bzhon pa la zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /gzhon nu
ma yi bzhon pa la/ /zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro/ gzhon nu'i bzhon pa la zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /bzhon pa de rnams la zhen nas/ /phyogs
kun du ni rjes su 'gro /gtso bo rgyal po khyad med do/ /glang chen bzhon dang rta yi bzhon/ /lha'i bzhon pa la gnas nas/ /khang bzang dang ni khyogs rnams ni/ /rgyal po chen po
grags chen ldan/ /de'i yang grub pa'i grong khyer ni/ /dri med par snang la gnas pa/ /lcang lo can dang ku sha'i grong / /pha rol ku sha'i grong dang ni/ /nA TA'i grong dang pha rol gyi/ /
ku sha'i ta yi grong yin no/ /byang gi phyogs na thams cad rgyas/ /skye bo'i tshogs pa mang po gnas/ /dgu bcu rtsa dgu grong mkha' la/ /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can/ /slar yang
drang srong chen po dang / /rgyal po chen po lus ngan po/ /cog ldan zhes pa rgyal po chen po'i pho brang ngo / /de'i phyir rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lus ngan po zhes brjod do//
so sor rab tu gsal zhing zhi ba dang / de dang der ni de dang de mdangs dang / de'i gzi brjid dang / dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal po stobs dang ldan pa'i ming ngo / /sa
gzhi yang ni bcud ldan no/ /gnas der sprin rnams char 'bebs par byed do/ /der ni b+ha ga la ba tI zhes pa'i rdzing bu'o/ /gang du gnod sbyin tshogs dang lhan cig tu gnas
so| |der ni rtag tu shing gi 'bras/ /sna tshogs bya rnams lhan cig gnas/ /rma bya khrung khrung sgra sgrogs shing / /khu byug rnams ni tshan tshan gnas/ /shang shang te'u sgra sgrogs
shing / /de nas yang ni dur pa dang / /gong mo nags kyi bya gag rnams/ /nags kyi rdzing bur gnas pa'o/ /ne tso ri skegs de sgra 'byin/ /daN+Da mA na
bya dkar dang / /dus kun du ni mdzes par byed/ /lus ngan rgyal po'i rdzing rtag mdzes/ /'di ni byang gi phyogs kyi yul/ /skye bo rnams ni 'di bzhin brjod/ /de yi phyogs ni
yongs skyong ba'i/ /rgyal po chen po grags dang ldan/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /'di yi ming ni lus ngan bo/ /gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar
gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go /de yang sangs rgyas mthong
ba dang / /nyi ma'i gnyen gyis sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog
khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di brjod
do| |rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /rgyal ba gau ta ma phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dir ni drang srong chen pos
lcang lo can dang bcas pas srungs shig /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma rnams bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe bar med pa dang / bde ba dang /
legs par gnas so/ /drang srong chen po/ gang su dag /dge slong dang bcas pa'am/ dge slong ma dang bcas pa'am/ dge bsnyen dang bcas pa'am/ dge bsnyen ma dang bcas
pa rnams dang / 'dir lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis de bsrung ba dang / yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad yongs su gzung zhig /de yang mi ma yin rnams so/ /gnod sbyin nam/ gnod
sbyin mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram/ gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ dri za
pho'am/ dri za mo'am/ dri za'i phu pho'am/ dri za'i bu mo'am/ dri za'i blon po chen po'am/ dri za'i 'khor ram/ dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bum pho'am/ grul bum
mo'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo'am/ grul bum gyi blon po chen po'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor ram/ grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ klu pho'am/
klu mo'am/ klu'i bu pho'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i blon po chen po'am/ klu'i 'khor ram/ klu'i g.yog 'khor rnams/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'gro ba'am/ rjes
su 'gro ba'am/ rjes su 'gro ba dang / sdod pa dang / lhan cig tu sdod pa dang / gnas pa dang / lhan cig tu gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang
lhan cig tu gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang / lhan cig tu nyal ba rnams la/ drang srong chen po/ 'di rnams ni mi ma yin rnams zhes bya'o/ /grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ bkur stir byed

pa'am/ bsti stang du byed pa rnams/ drang srong chen po/ mi ma yin rnams kyis de thob pa ma yin no/ /rgyal po chen po'i pho brang lcang lo can zhes bya ba gzhi'am/ gnas sa med do/ /drang srong chen po/
mi ma yin rnams kyis gnod sbyin dang lhan cig tu gnas pa'ang mi 'thob bo/ /drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyis bka' mnyan par bya'o/ /drang srong chen po/ gzhan
yang / mi ma yin rnams kyis bdag la phan pa rdzogs pa dang / pha rol la smod pa dang / rtsod ba dang / drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang / mi ma yin rnams la snod mer rab tu 'bar
ba mgo la bskon pa dang / drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang / mi ma yin rnams kyi mgo bo tshal ba bdun du gshegs par byed do/ /drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang / mi ma yin ni gtum
ba dang / drag pa dang / khro ba'o/ /de rnams kyis 'di ltar rgyal po chen po la rjod do/ /rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na skyes bu la sogs pa la rjod par byed do/ /
rgyal po chen po'i skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na/ de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/ /drang srong chen po/ de yang mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po la 'gal ba smra ba'o/ /drang
srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ ma ga d+ha'i yul gyi rgyal po la chom rkun byung na/ de ma thag tu rgyal po la rjod par byed do/ /rgyal po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la rjod par
byed do/ /skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na/ de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu brjod par byed pa bzhin no/ /drang srong chen po/ yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po la chom rkun gyis gnod pa byed par brjod
do| |drang srong chen po/ 'di lta bu'i mi ma yin yod pa rnams gtum pa dang / drag pa dang / khro ba'o/ /de ma thag tu rgyal po chen po rnams la rjod par byed do/ /rgyal po chen po la
brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/ /skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/ /drang srong chen po/ mi ma yin rnams
rgyal po chen po rnams la 'gal ba rjod par byed do/ /drang srong chen po/ mi ma yin gang zhig gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu'am/ gnod sbyin
gyi bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram/ gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ dri za pho'am/ dri za mo'am/ dri za'i bu pho'am/
dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i blon po chen po 'am/ dri za'i 'khor ram/ dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bum po'am/ grul bum mo'am/ grul bum gyi
bu pho 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo'am/ grul bum gyi blon po chen po'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor ram/ grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ klu pho 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu'i bu pho 'am/ klu'i
bu mo 'am/ klu'i blon po chen po'am/ klu'i 'khor ram/ klu'i g.yog 'khor rnams rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
bsnyen ma rnams 'gro ba 'am/ rjes su 'gro ba'am/ rjes su 'gro ba dang / sdod pa dang / lhan cig tu sdod pa dang / nyal ba dang / lhan cig tu nyal ba dang / 'di rnams ni
gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang / sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang / nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgra
cher sgrogs par byed pa'o/ /'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis
rnam par mtho 'tsham par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis mi gtong par
byed do/ /gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang / sde dpon chen po rnams gang zhe na/ dbang po zla ba chu zla dang / /b+hA ra dwa dza skye dgu'i
bdag /tsan+dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang / /mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang / /skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang / /lha las byung ba'i kha lo ba/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /mi
rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang / /de bzhin ri dang gangs can dang / /gang ba smin drug phug dang ni/ /'tshe ba dang ni btang bzung dang / /sna tshogs bshes gnyen gnya' shing 'dzin//
sa skyong rab tu rtogs pa dang / /ngo tsha mig dang khang pa dang / /lnga len gtum po A la pa ka /srid sgrub yid bzang bzhin bzang dang / /zho sdong nor bu nor bu spyod/ /de bzhin dbang
phyug dang bcas so/ /'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang / sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang / nga ro sgrogs
par byed pa dang / sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o/ /'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas/ gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar byed pa dang /
gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par mtho 'tsham par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed ba dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis ni
mi gtong bar byed do/ /drang srong chen po/ 'dis ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
bsnyen ma dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang / legs par gnas so/ /drang srong chen po/ da ni bdag cag rnams 'gro
bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag rnams ni bya ba mang ba dang / byed pa mang bas so/ /dge slong dag /bdag gis da ni rgyal po chen po rnams la 'gro ba'i gnang ba byin no/ /de nas rgyal
po chen po bzhi po rnams langs nas/ bdag la phyag byas te/ bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang langs nas
bdag la phyag byas bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang su dag gis bdag la bsnyun gsol te/ bsnyun gsol nas snying po dang /snying po med pa ji ltar
zhes zhus pa de rnams de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang su dag gis bdag ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas 'dud pa byas te mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang la la zhig gis
ming dang / rigs rnam par dpyad nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang la la zhig cang mi smra bar gyur te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag/ kha ton du
zungs la lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig / dge slong dag /chongs la lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig /dge slong dag /don dang bcas pas lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis
srungs shig /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang / legs par gnas so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /skabs rabs mchog gnyis pa ste lcang
lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lots+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/
skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig/ //rgya
gar skad du/ mahA sa ma ya sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'dus pa chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gzhi'i tshal chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya ste/ de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams dang lhan cig
tu bzhugs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams de ma thag tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams blta ba'i phyir ro/ /de
nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i ris bzhi po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gzhi'i tshal chen po na dge slong gi dge
'dun chen po lnga brgya ste/ de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams de ma thag tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams blta ba'i phyir ro/ /gang dag de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der de dag song ste song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa so
sor brjod par bya'o/ /de nas lha de rnams kyis/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam dang / brkyang pa las bskum pa de bzhin du gnas
gtsang ma'i lha rnams mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /
phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas yang lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams gsol to/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshal 'di ru/ /lha yi tshogs rnams
'dus pa ste/ /chos 'di'i phyir du bdag 'ongs pa/ /dge 'dun mi pham 'dus pa blta/ /de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/ /dge
'dun sems rnams dul ba dang / /rang gi sems ni drang por byas/ /kha lo sgyur ba'i drang por 'dzin/ /de bzhin mkhas pas dbang po bsrung / /de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan
'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/ /khyim gyi 'ching ba bton pa dang / /dbang po nas ni sems 'gro zhing / /dag cing dri med der 'gro ba/ /mig ldan glang po dul ba bzhin//
de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba/ /de ni ngan song 'gro mi 'gyur/ /mi yi lus ni spangs
nas su/ /lha yi lus ni yongs rdzogs 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams bos te de ma thag tu/ dge slong dag / 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams 'dus
te de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa blta ba'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag /gang de rnams su gyur pa 'das pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas de rnams bcom ldan 'das de tsam du gyur pa de bzhin du lha rnams 'dus par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ bdag kyang 'di skad ces smra ste/ dge slong dag /lha'i tshogs
rnams kyi ming brjod par bya ste/ dge slong dag /rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i lha'i tshogs dang / dge slong dag /lha'i tshogs ston par byed
pa zhes bya ba'o/ /de thos nas legs par yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o/ /de ltar btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de rnams kyis so sor zhus nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshigs su bcad pa so sor bshad/ /gang dus gzhi mthong gyur nas/ /ri yi phug tu gang gnas pa/ /de ru mnyam par 'jog
par byed/ /sa gzhir seng ge 'jigs med bzhin/ /ba spu tsam yang g.yo ba med/ /sems ni dag cing dkar ba dang / /chu ni rab tu dwangs pa bzhin/ /lnga brgya po yis legs
shes shing / /ser skya'i tshal gnas mang po rnams/ /de nas dge slong ston pas pos/ /bstan la dga' ba'i nyan thos rnams/ /lha yi tshogs rnams 'ongs nas ni/ /dge slong
rnams kyis de shes bya/ /lus ni gdung bar ma byed par/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa thos pas so/ /de rnams ye shes snang bar 'gyur/ /mi ma yin rnams mthong 'gyur ba/ /gang
zhig gis ni brgya mthong zhing / /stong dang bdun cu mthong ba yin/ /brgya dang stong phrag gcig dang ni/ /mi ma yin rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig gis ni mtha' med mthong //
phyogs kun gang bar 'gyur ba mthong / /de rnams kyis ni rtogs pa dang / /spyan ldan rnam bar dpyad nas ni/ /de phyir ston pa yis ni bos/ /bstan la dga' ba'i nyan thos kyis/ /lha
yi tshogs rnams 'ongs nas ni/ /dge slong rnams kyis de shes bya/ /gang zhig la ni bdag bshad bya/ /go rim bzhin du mnyan par gyis/ /stong phrag bdun gyi gnod sbyin rnams/ /
ser skya'i sa la gnas pa ni/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /stong phrag
drug ni gangs can gyi/ /gnod sbyin kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi ba
dge slong tshal du'o/ /sna tshogs bshes gnyen lnga brgya po/ /gnod sbyin kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos
gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /rgyal khab gnod sbyin chu srin ni/ /ngos yangs ri la gnas pa yin/ /stobs ldan 'bum phrag gcig po
ni| |gnod sbyin rnams kyi 'khor gyis bskor/ /rgyal khab gnod sbyin chu srin ni/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /shar phyogs kyi ni rgyal po ni/ /ming ni yul 'khor srung
zhes pa/ /dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes
bya stobs chen po/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /lho yi phyogs
kyi 'ang rgyal po ni/ /ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya/ /grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos
pa ste| |dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal
du'o| |nub kyi phyogs kyi rgyal po ni/ /ming ni mig mi bzang zhes grags/ /klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni
gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas
dge slong tshal du'o/ /byang gi phyogs kyi rgyal po ni/ /de ming lus ngan po zhes grags/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /de yi bu ni mang po
rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs to/ /zhi
bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor skyong / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /de rnams rgyal po
chen po bzhi/ /phyogs rnams bzhi po kun du'o/ /gzi brjid 'bar bas 'khod na ni/ /ser skya'i gzhi yi tshal du'o/ /de rnams sgyu ma rtsed mo bsams/ /drung ldan rnams ni nam mkhar
'khod/ /sgyu ma sku DeN+ya bai Da Nu/ /biR+ya ts+tsha biR+ya Do bcas/ /tsan dan dang 'dod mchog dang / /mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang / /skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang / /lha las byung
ba'i kha lo pa/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /mi rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang / /mdun du rtse mo lnga de bzhin/ /g.yer ma dang ni nyi zer dang / /de dang gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams/ /rgyal
po dri za dang bcas dang / /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs nas/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /de nas gzhan yang nam mkha'i klu/ /yangs pa can du lhan cig nas/ /la ba rti yi mchog
dang ni/ /rab 'gro gnyen dang lhan cig ba/ /ya mu na dang yul 'khor skyong / /klu yi spun dang grags ldan dang / /sa srung glang po chen po rnams/ /de yang nags kyi tshal du'o/ /gang
zhig klu rgyal myur du len/ /lha dang bya dang rnam dag mig /nam mkha' las 'ongs tshal der sleb/ /sna tshogs 'dab bzang zhes de'i ming / /'jigs
med byin pas klu yi rgyal/ /mkha' lding bzod pa rtogs bas so/ /phan tshun du ni mi rtsod cing / /klu khyung sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba/ /rdo rje lag gis rgyal ba dang / /lha ma yin ni
rgya mtshor gnas/ /spun rnams de yi gnas dang ni/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ /nag po mig sman 'jigs byed ldan/ /lha ma yin rnams khro byed dang / /thags
bzang dang ni thags bzang ris/ /mtshan 'joms na mo tsi dang bcas/ /stobs kyi bu ni brgya po rnams/ /thams cad rnam par snang mdzad ming / /stobs kyi sde ni go bgos
pa| |sgra gcan bzang po sdun du 'gro /btsun pa de ni 'dus nas ni/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /chu dang lha dang sa dang ni/ /me dang rlung yang der 'ongs so/ /chu lha chu yi lha
dang ni/ /zla ba dang ni grags par ldan/ /byams dang snying rje'i tshogs can dang / /lha ni grags ldan mdun du'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams ni/ /thams cad
kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /khyab
'jug lha dang lhan cig tu/ /tha dad tha dad 'ongs pa dang / /zla ba de yi 'khor gyi lha/ /zla ba'i mdun byas 'khor dang ni/ /nyi ma'i 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / /nyi ma'i mdun byas 'khor
dang ni/ /rgyu skar de yi 'khor dang yang / /mdun byas pa la ha ka dang / /sa dang sa yi gtso bo dang / /brgya byin yang yang sbyin pa dang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams dang / /
thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /de nas
nyer spyod lha dang ni/ /chu dang me yi rtse mo bzhin/ /sgra ldan snang bar byed pa dang / /u ma'i me tog de bzhin du/ /chu lha dang bcas chos dang ni/ /ats+tsu ta dang du ma rnams/ /bzang
len mdzes pa'i mdun dang ni/ /mdun dang gnas dang du ma dang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/ /thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//
kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /'dus dang 'dus pa chen po ni/ /mi dang mi yi mchog dang ni/ /rol pa'i go
'phang mdun du dang / /yid mchog dang ni go 'phang rtse/ /de nas lha yi mchod 'os dang / /gang yang dmar po'i gos gyon dang / /pha rol pha rol son chen dang / /grags chen lha
yi mdun gnas dang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/ /thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha
dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /dkar dang drod dang dmar po dang / /sngon bzhugs stugs po lhan cig dang / /
dkar po 'dzin pa la sogs dang / /mkhas pa'i lha ni sngon du 'o/ /rtag tu glang chen myos 'brang ba/ /'dres pa grags dang ldan pa dang / /pradz+dzu na no mang po mdun du dang / /gang zhig
phyogs ni mdzes pa dang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams dang / /thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags
par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du 'o/ /dge ba dga' ldan 'thab bral dang / /grags ldan shing dang ldan pa dang / /'phyang ba gnas
dang gtso bo dang / /'od dang bsam pa zhes bya dang / /'phrul dga' ba ni sdun du dang / /de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed sdun/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/ /
thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /sna tshogs drug po'i sde ba ni//
thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /ming ni grags dang ldan pa sngon/ /gang gzhan 'dra ba lhan cig tu/ /ma lus rigs ni brjod pa dang / /zag med tshogs ni pha rol rgal/ /glang chen
tshogs ni blta ba dang / /zla ba bzhad pa gsum ldan dang / /tshangs bzang mchog ni thob pa dang / /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i bu dang ni/ /de yi dga' ba'i gzhon nu ni/ /de rnams zhi bas tshal
bu'o| |tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong du ni/ /tshangs pa chen po nye bar 'khod/ /'od dang ldan par skye ba dang / /grags ldan sna tshogs lus dang ni/ /dbang phyug bcu po sngon du dang / /so
so dbang du gyur pa dang / /de yi dbus dang sngon du dang / /'phrog ma 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /de rnams thams cad 'ongs gyur nas/ /dbang po lha dang tshangs bcas 'ongs/ /bdud
kyi sde rnams 'ongs nas ni/ /gau tam thugs ni blta ba dang / /'di ni zungs shig chings shig brjod/ /tshags pa glang po bcings pa bzhin/ /'khor dang bcas pas bskor
nas ni/ /gang du'ang gtong ba ma yin no/ /de la 'di ni bde chen dang / /go tam sde la gnod mi nus/ /lag pa thal mo rdebs pa dang / /'jigs par byed pa'i cho nge sgrogs//
ji ltar rlung gis sprin rnams dang / /mun nags glog dang bcas pa ni/ /de ma thag tu 'jigs dang bral/ /bsam pa khro ba med par gnas/ /lha de rnams thams cad dang /
tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /bdud kyi sde de rnams kyang cang mi smra ba'i tshul gyis song ngo / /
ston pas nyan thos bstan pa la dga' ba rnams bos te/ de yang 'jigs pa med byed dang / /dag pa'i sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /'jigs med 'dod chags bral ba ni/ /de
yi ba spu'ang g.yo ba med/ /g.yul ni kun las rgyal ba dang / /'jigs pa 'das shing grags par ldan/ /lha dang lhan cig brjod pa dang / /nyan thos rnams ni de gnas
so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'dus pa chen po'i mdo
rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas mang du thos pa'i lots+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams
kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma dang / zla ba ltar gyur cig/ //rgya gar
skad du/ mai trI sU tra/ bod skad du/ byams pa'i mdo/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /ston pa dus gcig na ser skya'i gzhi dang / n+ya gro
d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang / chu klung ro hi na'i 'gram na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ma 'ongs pa'i rgyal ba de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ khyed kyi rjes
bstan blo brtan ni/ /ci 'dra'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar/ /spyan ldan yongs su rgyas par ni/ /bdag ni rab tu nyan par 'dod/ /gnas brtan zhus pa gsan nas ni/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /bsod nams phung po mi nyung ba'i/ /grags pa chen po mi pham pa'i/ /yon tan thams cad brjod mi nus/ /mdor bsdus nas ni legs
bshad pa/ /phyogs gcig tsam ni bstan par bya/ /shA ri'i bu nyon nga yi tshig /'di ni bskal ba bzang po ste/ /skye ba bye ba'i lo ru ni/ /byams pa zhes pa'i ming nyid kyis/ /rkang
gnyis mchog gi sangs rgyas so/ /ji ltar nga 'das nas dang por dus lnga 'byung ste/ 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus dang / bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus dang / lung gi bar gyi dus dang / rtags
tsam gyi bar gyi dus dang / sku gdung gi bar gyi dus so/ /de la 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus ni/ sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ lo stong phrag gcig gi nang du rtogs
ba skyed par nus so/ /de song zhing song ba'i dus su/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /de rnams yod pa na 'bras bu'i bar gyi
dus med ces brjod bar mi bya'o/ /lhag ma ni rgyun du zhugs pa ste/ de 'das nas 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni 'bras bu'i bar gyi
dus nub pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus zhes bya ba ni/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi lam gyi 'bras bu bslab par mi nus par pham pa bzhi po bsrung bar nus
pa tsam mo/ song zhing song ba'i dus su/ pham pa bzhi po de nyid bsrung ba tsam mo/ /pham pa bzhi po srung bar byed pa ni/ dge slong rnams stong phrag gcig gi nang na brgya tsam
yod na yang bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes mi bya'o/ /brgya'i nang na dge slong gcig tsam yod pa las sdom pa zhig pa dang / sha bi na bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa
zhes bya'o/ /'di ni bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o/ /lung gi bar gyi dus zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sde snod gsum po'i don mi go zhing sgra tsam
